El socio es el Sr. Isaias; el tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio sigue con el negocio de transporte,el tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,el socio trabaja en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco,por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a su hijo,el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de servicio de taxi .El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar respuestos para su carro. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Isaias is 28 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has one child. He continues with his transportation business. Isaias has a car that he uses to provide taxi services between the hours of 7am and 10pm. He works along different streets within the city of Cusco. Through this business, he is able to help his son move forward. Isaias wants to expand and improve his taxi business, so he is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

He is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his taxi.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su esposa tiene una hija de tres años de edad, el atiende un taller de mecánica automotriz y pintura, lleva 6 años en el negocio, trabaja todos los días de la semana de 7:00am a 4:00pm, este oficio lo aprendió de un amigo.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pintura y algunos repuestos para mantener en el taller, este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar la capacidad del negocio y así ofrecer un mejor servicio a la clientela.
La aspiración de Juan es apoyar a su hija, tanto en la educación como en los demás gastos alimenticios y médicos, para que se pueda superar.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and their three-year-old daughter. He manages an auto repair and paint shop. Juan has been in this business for six years. He works every day of the week from 7am to 4pm. Juan learned this trade from a friend.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy paint and some spare parts so that he can maintain his shop. This loan will help improve his business capacity so that he can offer better service to his customers.

Juan aspires to support his daughter with her education, as well as with food and health costs, so that she can thrive.

loans.use: to buy paint and spare parts for his repair shop.

loans.name: Rita Del Carmen

texts.es: Rita Del Carmen es pensionada, ella está solicitando este crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, inodoro, pega, clavos, cemento entre otros. Ella es una mujer muy responsable y quiere realizarle estas mejoras a su hogar pues son muy necesarias. A pesar de que ya no trabaja con lo poco que obtiene quiere mejorar cada día su vivienda, los esfuerzos constantes le han ayudado a sobrevivir. Sueña con ampliar cada día su vivienda.
texts.en: Rita Del Carmen is a pensioner.  She is applying for this loan so that she can buy construction materials such as zinc, a toilet, adhesive, nails, cement, and other supplies.  Rita is a very responsible woman who wants to make necessary improvements to her home.  Even though she is no longer working, Rita wants to use what little she has to make improvements each day to her home.  Her constant efforts have helped her to survive.  She dreams of expanding her home each day.

loans.use: to buy zinc, a toilet, adhesive, nails, cement, and other supplies.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es: José, nuevamente se decidió a adquirir un préstamo, porque necesita comprar más herramientas para su taller como: repuestos y laminas, además comprar maiz para el consumo diario, el objetivo de el es que se facilite el trabajo y tener lo necesario para atender a sus clientes. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho pues logro más clientela y solventar los problemas económicos de su familia.
texts.en:
José decided to request another loan because he needs to buy more equipment for his repair shop such as spare parts and metal sheets. He also wants to buy corn for daily consumption. His goal is to make his work more efficient and have everything he needs to serve his customers.

The previous loan was a great help because he was able to attract more customers and resolve his family’s financial problems.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, metal sheets, and corn.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Guadalupe le está haciendo falta la barda al frente.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar el material que es (block, cemento, varilla, arena y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora. Ya que actual mente con cuenta con el dinero necesario para elaborar la barda y le preocupa la seguridad de su hijo en la casa. 
Doña Guadalupe planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe de su empleo en una fabrica, como supervisora, y su esposo el señor Santos Isidro se encargara de los gastos familiares y escolares de su hijo, con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo en una maquiladora en el aria de producción. 
Desean mejorar la calidad de vida y la seguridad de su familia y que el patrimonio este en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
The home of Sra. Guadalupe is lacking a security wall at the front. She is requesting a loan to buy materials such as blocks, cement, rods, sand, and to pay to have someone make this improvement. Guadalupe is currently concerned about the safety of her son at home, which why she is currently requesting the necessary funds to build this wall.

Doña Guadalupe plans to repay the loan with the salary she earns from her job as a supervisor at a factory. Her husband Sr. Santos Isidro will take charge of the family expenses and their son’s schooling. He also has a job at a factory and earns his income by working in the production unit.

They want to improve the quality of life and safety of their family, as well as have assets that are in good condition.

loans.use: to pay for materials and labor in order to build a security wall in front of her house.

loans.name: Evert Antonio

texts.es: Everth Antonio tiene su negocio que es la venta de granos básicos, el siempre se ha preocupado por brindar un buen servicio. El motivo del crédito que solicita es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, maíz, trigo entre otros productos. El tiene su negocio desde hace 5 años y solicito el crédito para la compra de mercadería para surtir su tienda y así poder ofrecer variedad de productos a sus clientes, ella es una persona muy trabajadora dice estar eternamente agradecida por el trato recibido en la institución.
texts.en:
Evert Antonio has a business that sells dry goods. He has always been concerned about providing good service. The reason he is requesting this loan is so that he can buy rice, beans, oil, sugar, corn, wheat, and other products. His business has been in operation for five years, so he is requesting this loan so that he can buy merchandise to restock his store. This will also help him to offer a variety of products to his customers.

Evert is an extremely hardworking individual. He says that he is eternally grateful for the service he has received from the organization.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, sugar, corn, wheat, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit plants, ornamental pots, and organic and chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es: Dora, de 52 años, es una mujer buena y amable. Vive con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos, de los cuales dos ya son mayores e independientes, mientras que uno de ellos vive a lado de ellos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia junto a un hijo mayor que tiene a su familia a lado. EL trabajo de Dora consiste en la venta de comida, por las noches sale a la vereda da su casa, ahí alista todo para esperar a sus fieles comensales que van en busca de un buen servicio y excelente sazón como el que tienen ella. Lleva trabajando por tres años y le agrada mucho ya que la cocina siempre fue su pasión, al principio le fue difícil de poder iniciar ya que las personas no sabían que tal sazón tenía y no iban mucho, pero a punto de esfuerzo y sobre todo buen trato se supo ganar a sus clientes quienes ahora van en busca de sus deliciosos platos que prepara. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es le da tiempo de hacer otras actividades durante el día, le esta yendo bien ya que todos los días genera buenas ventas y esto le da buenos ingresos. Tiene en mente ampliar su negocio, para ello necesita comprar mesas y sillas. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de una pequeña ayuda para que pueda cumplir son sus objetivos, además se compromete en ser puntual y sobre todo muy responsable ya que no desea quedar mal con su grupo al que se esta incorporando y ve que son muy buenos y amables. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ingredientes e insumos para seguir con la preparación de sus deliciosos platos de comida y así poder ofrecer mayor variedad a sus comensales.
texts.en: Dora is 52 years old. She is a good and friendly woman. She lives with her spouse with whom she has three children. Two of them are grown and independent, while one of them still ives with them. Together they live in their own home with their oldest son, who has his family with him. Dora's job is selling food. She goes out evenings to the sidewalk in front of her house and gets everything ready for her faithful diners who seek out her good service and excellent flavoring. She has been working for three years and she really likes it since cooking has always been her passion. At first, it was difficult since people didn't know how good her food was and they didn't go very often. But with hard work and more than anything, good service, she was able to gain customers who now seek out the delicious food she prepares. What she likes about her job is that it gives her time to do other activities during the day. It is going well for her and she has good sales every day and this is giving her good income. She is planning on expanding her business, and for that she needs to buy tables and chairs. This will be her first loan with MFP and she hopes for a little help to achieve her goals. She is also committed to being very punctual and  above all responsible since she doesn't want to look bad with the group she is a part of, since they are good and friendly people. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy ingredients and materials to keep preparing her delicious dishes and offer more variety to her diners.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and materials.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana, se decidió a tener otro préstamo, porque quiere mejorar su negocio surtiéndolo de mercadería como: pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa interior, el propósito de ella es ofrecerles a los clientes más calidad y variedad.Estos prestamos anteriores le ayudaron mucho a mejorar el inventario porque mejoro en los ingresos, esto le permite que su familia se mantenga solo de los ingresos y no presenta ningún problema ya que viven en mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Ana decided to take out another loan because she would like to improve her business, stocking it with merchandise such as pants, shirts, blouses and underwear.  Her goal is to offer her customers more quality and variety.  Her previous loans helped her a lot in improving her stock and she improved her income.  She is able to support her family solely on her income and she has no problems as they are living in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses and underwear

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, en esta ocasión lo quiere para mejorar su negocio surtiéndolo de mercadería como: azúcar, aceite, arroz, frijoles, sopas instantáneas, el propósito de ella es mejorar en sus productos y satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Los financiamientos anteriores le ayudaron mucho a mantener siempre estable su negocio, el cual le ha permitido mejorar las condiciones de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en: Marta is requesting a new loan.  On this occasion, she would like a loan to improve her business, stocking it with merchandise such as sugar, oil, rice, beans and instant soups.  Her goal is to improve the products she offers and to satisfy her customer demand.  Her previous loans helped her a lot in keeping her business stable.  This has enabled her to improve her own living conditions as well as those of her family.

loans.use: to buy sugar, oil, rice, beans and instant soups

loans.name: Socorro De La Concepcion

texts.es: Socorro De La Concepción tiene 25 años, ella es profesora de primaria y con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante con su negocio, ella no tiene muchos ingresos de su trabajo, pero quiere lo mejoras para su familia realizando las modificaciones necesarias. Su proyección es de obtener otro medio de vida para  mejorar los ingresos de su hogar. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, clavos, pega entre otros. Finalmente tiene su sueño a largo plazo de su casa y formar una familia de éxito en la sociedad.
texts.en: Socorro De La Concepción is 25 years old.  She is an elementary school teacher and, with a lot of effort, she has managed to get ahead in her work.  She does not make a lot of income from her work but she would like to make some improvements for her family, making necessary modifications.  Her plan is to find another way of earning a living so that she can improve her household income.  She is requesting this loan to buy building supplies such as sheets of metal, nails, adhesive etc. Her long-term dream is to finish her house and to form a successful family.

loans.use: to buy sheets of metal, nails, adhesive, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 5 loads of wood in order to make griddles and 200 pounds of corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
La señora Adela tiene 68 años de edad, vive sola y tiene seis hijos que ya son independientes.

Ella es una mujer que desde pequeña le ha gustado trabajar mucho y dice que continuara durante Dios le preste vida. Cuando vivía con sus padres, ella trabajaba para que a ellos no les faltara nada, vendía de todo un poco, viajaba desde su cantón hasta la ciudad y compraba frutas, verduras, chorizo, entre otros.

Desde hace unos 14 años, vende queso, crema, cuajada y pan, día de por medio ella sale a vender casa por casa a pie, en su cantón y caseríos vecinos, lo hace de 2:00 de la tarde a 5:00 de la tarde. Adela se traslada a dos ciudades, para comprar el queso y la crema en libras, esto le genera ganancias.

Adela solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 20 sacos de maíz, que le servirán para alimentar a sus animales, ya que ella engorda cerdos, y de la leche que cuaja, obtiene suero y esto mas el maíz da de alimento a los cerdos. También lo utilizara para consumo personal y algunas veces para vender. Adela es una mujer sola, por lo que siempre le gusta estar preparada por cualquier necesidad, ella siempre por esta fecha saca prestamos para tener provisiones y seguir trabajando. 

Adela desea cambiar el techo de su casa, por que en el invierno se moja demasiado su casa, más con el temporal de octubre se le quebraron dos cuartones de madera del techo. Por esta razón, ella confía que en el verano realizara ese cambio con la ayuda de Dios y Fundación Campo.
texts.en:
Adela is 68 years old. She lives alone and has six children that are already independent.
She is a woman that from an early age liked to work hard and says that she will continue as long as god gives her life. When she was living with her parents, she worked so that they never lacked anything. She sold a little of everything and traveled from her city to another city and bought fruits, vegetables, and chorizo (sausage), among others.
For about 14 years, she has sold cheese, cream, curds and bread. She goes out every other day to sell door to door on foot, in her city and neighboring farmhouses. She does it from 2:00 in the afternoon until 5:00 in the afternoon. Adela travels to two cities in order to buy the cheese and cream by the pound. This generates her profits.
Adela is requesting a loan of Fundación Campo (Field Foundation) in order to buy 20 bags of corn, which will serve to feed her animals, as she raises pigs. From the milk that curdles she obtains whey and this over the corn provides food for the pigs. Also she will utilize it to for personal consumption and sometimes to sell. Adela is a single woman. Due to that she always likes to be prepared for any need. She continues to date to take out loans in order to have provisions and to continue working.
Adela wants to change the roof of her house, because in the winter her house gets too wet, more so with the storm in October because two panels of wood broke on the roof. For this reason, she trusts that in the summer she will make this change with the help of God and Fundación Campo.

loans.use: to buy 20 bags of corn.

loans.name: Ela

texts.es: Ela, de 31 años, es una mujer buena y amable. Vive con su pareja, con quien tiene un hijo de 7 años en su casa propia.  El trabajo de Ela consiste en el alquiler de mototaxi, lleva trabajando en este negocio ya por dos años y lo hace con la ayuda de su conviviente quien maneja una unidad y el otro mototaxi lo maneja un chofer, quien paga el alquiler de dicho vehículo. Empezó a realizar esta actividad a raíz que tuvo necesidades de poder tener mayor ingreso en su hogar. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene un ingresos adicional al de su pareja y gracias a ello puede solventar los gastos del hogar. Este será el primer crédito con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Además es conciente de la responsabilidad que asume y hará todo lo posible para poder pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará piezas, repuestos y pagará al mecánico para hacer la refacción total de sus dos vehículos.
texts.en:
31-year-old Ela is a good and kind woman.  She lives with her partner and 7-year-old son in her own home.  Ela's work is renting out a motorcycle taxi.  She has been in this business for two years.  She works with her partner, who drives one of the vehicles.  The other vehicle is driven by a driver who pays to hire it.  Ela started out in this business because she needed to have more income for her household.  What she likes about her work is that it makes her extra income in addition to that of her partner and, thanks to it, she is able to cover her household expenses.

This will be Ela's first loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can continue reaching her goals.  She is aware of the responsibility that this implies and will do everything she can to make her loan repayments on time.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy spare parts and to pay the mechanic who will totally refurbish her two vehicles.

loans.use: to pay a mechanic to fix her two vehicles, and to buy spare parts

loans.name: Ruth Mercedes

texts.es: Ruth Mercedes tiene 37 años su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio. Ruth es responsable, puntual y a manejar su negocio. Agradece esta oportunidad que se le está otorgando porque gracias a los préstamos que le otorgaron ha podido incrementar su inventario. Así mejorar su negocio, ahora ella trabaja juntamente con su hijo que la apoya. El préstamo que está solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de calzado, cosméticos, ropa en general y sabanas.
texts.en: Ruth Mercedes is 37 years old and sells general merchandise. She has had this business for more than 7 years. Ruth is responsible and punctual and manages her business. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is being given as thanks to the loans granted she has been able to expand her inventory and so improve her business. She now works together with her child who is helping her. The loan she is asking for will be invested in the purchase of footwear, cosmetics, clothes in general and sheets.

loans.use: to buy footwear, cosmetics, clothes in general and sheets.

loans.name: Patricio

texts.es:
El señor Patricio ya ha tenido dos créditos con KIVA los cuales a pagado puntual y han sido para mejorar su vivienda. 
A su casa le está haciendo falta el piso de concreto y el vitropiso, pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la inversión. Es por eso que solicita un préstamo para comprar el materia que es (cemento, arena, vitropiso y el pegamento especial para pegar). 
Don patricio se encargara de realizar la mejora en horario adicional a su trabajo de la construcción, con una parte del sueldo que recibe planea pagar el crédito, es la fuente de ingreso que tiene ya que su esposa la señora Eleuteria se encarga de atender y cuidar a su hijo. 
Desea proteger a su familia de enfermedades y que tenga un lugar seguro y como para ellos.
texts.en:
Señor Patricio has already had 2 loans with Kiva which he has repaid puntually and were for home improvements. His house needs a concrete floor and glazed floor tiles but he doesn't have the money necessary to make the improvements. This is why he is asking for a loan to buy building materials such as cement, sand, glazed floor tiles and special glue. 

Don Patricio is responsible for making the improvements in addition to his work in construction. With part of his salary he plans on paying off the loan. This salary is his sole source of income as his wife Señora Eleuteria is in charge of taking care of their child.
 
He wants to protect his family from illness and ensure that they have a secure and comfortable place of thier own.

loans.use: to put a concrete floor and glazed floor tiles in place in his house.

loans.name: Vivian Yolany

texts.es:
Vivian Yolany, de 21 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de un año  de edad, vive en la Esperanza Intibucá, su esposo trabaja en una empresa privada.

Hace mas de cuatro años que se dedica al negocio de venta de variedades, como Ropa, calzado,  cosméticos  y  accesorios  para damas de plata y enchapado. Su negocio lo inicio con ayuda del esposo. Es estable y esta ubicado en una buena zona comercial. 
Este préstamo es el primero que solicita y es para surtir de más productos para vender, como Ropa nueva y calzado.
Su meta es hacer crecer mas este negocio, para mejorar su  situación económica y en un futuro comprar su propia vivienda, ya que donde viven es una casa familiar.
texts.en:
Vivian Yolany is 21 years old, married, and has a one-year-old child. She lives in Esperanza Intibucá. Her husband works for a private company.

For the past four years, she has been managing a variety store where she sells clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and women’s accessories made of silver and metal plating. She started this business with help from her husband. Her business is stable and located in a commercial area.

This is the first loan she has requested and she will use the money to restock her store with more products to sell, such as clothing and shoes. Her goal is to grow her business even more so that she can improve her financial situation and her future. She wants to buy her own home since she currently lives at a relative’s house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as clothing, shoes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Zenabo

texts.fr:
Mme ZENABO est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 16ans et le moins âgé a 02ans.02 vont à l’école et  elle a 06 personnes en charge.

Elle fait la transformation d’akiéké  depuis 03ans. Elle s’approvisionne à la gare de train à Ouagadougou .Ses clients sont les femmes, les  hommes et enfants.

Elle veut  s’acheter  15 sacs de patte de manioc, 05 bouteilles de gaz de 06kg et 10 paquets de sachet pour le conditionnement.

 Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut s’approvisionner plus en patte pour stocker. Elle ambitionne installé une unité de production d’akiékié  et aider son mari pour l’éducation de ses enfants ainsi que leur santé.
texts.en:
Mrs. Zenabo is married and has three children. The oldest is 16 and the youngest is 2. Two of them attend school, and she has six people in her care.

She has been making attiéké (a cassava-based dish similar to couscous) for three years. She buys her supplies at the train station in Ouagadougou. Her customers are comprised of men, women, and children. 

She wants to buy 15 sacks of cassava paste, five 6-kilogram gas cylinders, and 10 packets of sachets for packaging.

With her profits, she wants to buy extra paste for her supplies. She would like to build an attiéké production unit and help her husband with the education and health of their children.

loans.use: to buy 15 sacks of cassava, five 6-kilogram gas cylinders, and 10 packets of sachets for packaging.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es: José, de nuevo ha solicitado  un crédito, debido a la buena atención de nuestra institución y por la necesidad de invertir en el negocio, comprara mas mercadería como: ropa para niños, damas y caballeros y medicina natural, el objetivo de él es seguir mejorando en sus ventas y tener variedad para ofrecerles a los clientes, Estos prestamos prestamos le han ayudado a fortalecer mas su negocio pues se incremento la clientela y obtuvo mejores ingresos, este avance le permitió vivir mejor con su familia, facilitarles lo que más necesitan que anteriormente no tenían.
texts.en: José is again applying for a loan due to the good care he received from our institution and also because he needs to invest in his business. He will buy more merchandise such as: children's, ladies' and men's clothing and natural medicine. His goal is to continue improving sales and offer variety to his customers. These loans have helped him strengthen his business more as there has been an increase in customer numbers and he has earned more income. This loan allowed him and his family to live a better life, providing them with what they most need and previously lacked.

loans.use: to buy children's, ladies' and men's clothing as well as natural medicines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk, coconut and candy.

loans.name: Jose Andres

texts.es: José, se decidió a tener otro crédito, para la recolección de la cosecha de este año de invierno y pagar los gastos de mozos, transporte y compra de plaguicidas para los cultivos. José manifieta que este apoyo financiero ayudaron a tener en buen estado sus cultivos por los fertilizantes adecuados, debido a eso las cosechas fueron mejores, esto ha permitido que su familia tenga lo necesario para el sustento diario.
texts.en: José decided to take another loan to harvest his winter's crop and pay for labour, transport and the purchase of pesticides for the crops. José tells us that this financial support has helped him have healthy crops by being able to use suitable fertilizers. Due to this his crops were better and his family was able to have the necessary daily food.

loans.use: to pay for labour and transport for harvesting the crop.

loans.name: Juana Luz

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Juana Luz; ella tiene 46 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia sigue en su negocio de crianza de animales,la socia cria gallinas,chanchos y cuyes ella los hace engordar y luego los vende en el mercado del distrito de Chinchero,la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de crianza de animales,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de crianza de animales .La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para los animales y también para comprar animales como pollos,cuyes y chanchos mal por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
46-year old Sra. Juana Luz is married and has two children. She continues to raise animals such as chickens, pigs, and guinea pigs. Once they are fattened, she sells them in the Chinchero market. With the income from her business she is helping her children get ahead. 

Now Juana wants to expand and improve the business so she is seeking a loan to buy animal feed and also to buy animals such as chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs at wholesale prices. She is happy to have the opportunity to get a loan and promises to pay back the money.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and young animals such as chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs

loans.name: Damaris Esther

texts.es: Damaris, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para mejorar el negocio, ella comprara piedras e hilos para crear pulseras, aretes, collares, para seguir haciendo nuevos estilos y variedad  de colores. Los préstamos para Damaris han significado mucho, ya que con esta ayuda económica ha podido comprar lo necesario para mejorar el negocio y que sea más productivo.
texts.en: Damaris is seeking a new loan to improve her business. She wishes to buy stones and thread so she can make bracelets, earrings, necklaces in new styles and a variety of colours. The loans have been a great help to Damaris since she has been able to buy whatever is needed to improve her business and become more productive.

loans.use: to buy thread and stones to make costume jewelry

loans.name: Juana Virginia

texts.es: Juana, tiene la necesidad de un nuevo préstamo, porque quiere continuar invirtiendo en él para mejorar económicamente, este lo invertirá en mercadería como frijoles, arroz, salsa, boquitas, aceite, huevos, pan, harinas, aumentando así la variedad en los productos. Esta inversión le servirá para abastecer el negocio y que igual al anterior sea todo un provecho para crecer y recibir más ingresos.
texts.en: Juana now needs a new loan as she wishes to continue investing in her business and earn more money. She wants to buy more merchandise such as beans, rice, sauces, snacks, oil, eggs, bread, and flour so that she has a greater variety of products. This investment will provide her with more stock, and as before she will benefit by increasing her income.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sauces, snacks, oil, eggs, bread, and flour

loans.name: Sara Esther

texts.es: Sara Con su credikiva anterior compró productos que vienen en sus guias especializadas y ganó descuentos por el volumen y es sistema de su compra, pues recurrió a los que presentaban grandes descuentos. En la actualidad comprará productos al pormayor para obtener descuentos por volumen , pues se acerca la temporada de mayor movimiento comercial, el final del año,  y espera aprovecharla para hacer de esta inversión todo un éxito. Ella dice a sus financiadores de Kiva : " Estoy muy agradecida por la ayuda recibida"
texts.en: With her previous Kiva loan, Sara bought merchandise to sell in her specialized catalogues. She received discounts due to the large volume and her system of purchasing, and she returns to those who offer the larger discounts. Sara will now continue to purchase wholesale products in order to receive bulk discounts - the busiest end-of-year shopping season is approaching which she hopes to take advantage of and make this investment a success. Sara tells her Kiva funders; "I am very grateful for the help I have received"

loans.use: to purchase wholesale cosmetics in order to obtain discounts

loans.name: Katiusca Eugenia

texts.es:
Katiusca, se dedica a la venta de mercadería como perfume, los señores, cremas con ella vive con su madre y hermanas, tiene un año de estar en el negocio, trabaja todos los días de la semana.
Ella está solicitando préstamo para la compra de dos cajas de mercadería entre ella cremas, lociones, maquillajes, con esta inversión podrá mejorar la disponibilidad para ofrecer al cliente.
La aspiración es mantener el negocio en un local propio, generando mayores ingresos para la familia.
texts.en:
Katiusca lives with her mother and sisters, and works selling merchandise like perfume, lotions, and creams.  She has had the business for a year.

She is requesting a loan to buy two boxes of merchandise, including creams, lotions, and make-up.  With this investment she will be able to improve  availability for her customers.

Katiusca's goal is to have the business in a suitable place, generating greater income for the family.

loans.use: to buy two boxes of merchandise: creams, lotions, and make-up.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Maria Del Carmen solicita un préstamo para empezar la construcción de un cuarto en el terreno que acaba de comprar. 
No cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material que es (varilla, cemento, arena y block, su esposo el señor Jerónimo se encargara de realizar la mejorar en horario adicional a si trabajo. 
 Doña Maria Del Carmen desea tener su propio patrimonio y que su pequeña hijo tenga un lugar seguro donde pueda vivir. 
Planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo en un restaurante, como empleada de cocina. El señor Jerónimo se encargara de los gastos familiares con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo en una tienda de artículos para la casa.
texts.en:
Maria Del Carmen applied for this loan to start constructing a room upon the land that she just bought. She does not have the money to buy the materials required (rods, cement, sand and bricks). Maria's husband Jerónimo will work the additional time required to improve the building. She wants to own her own property and wishes for a safe place to live for their small child.

Maria Del Carmen intends to repay the loan with the salary from her job as a maid in a restaurant kitchen. Jerónimo will take care of the household expenses with the income earned from working in a shop selling household goods.

loans.use: to begin construction of a room upon her plot of land

loans.name: Rigia

texts.es:
la socia Regia, tiene 31 años,  es casada, tiene dos hijos,la socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania,ella tiene un taller donde elabora trabajos en telares,mantas y tejidos,ella vende en el centro artesanal del distrito de chinchero,la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de artesania. La socia solicita el credito para comprar materiales para hacer las artesanias como lanas,tejedores y tintes y tambien para comprar artesanias al por mayor. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Regia, 31, is married and has two children. She continues to sell crafts. She has a workshop where she does weaving, such as mantas (traditional hand-woven shawls), and other woven articles. She sells in the Handicrafts Center of Chinchero district. By means of this business, she is raising her children. 

She wants to expand and improve her handicrafts business. She is applying for the loan to buy materials for making handicrafts, such as wool, looms, and dyes, and also to buy handicrafts at wholesale.  She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy materials for making handicrafts, such as wool, looms, and dyes, and also to buy crafts at wholesale.

loans.name: Marina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marina, trabaja como secretaria en un instituto, es madre soltera y vive junto a su madre, lleva 11 años trabajando todos los días desde las siete de la mañana hasta las tres de la tarde, ella provee para su familia todo lo necesario.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de arena, cemento, ladrillo, para la construcción y reparación de la vivienda donde habita con su familia. 
La aspiración de marina es que a través de un esfuerzo puedan mejorar las condiciones de su familia
texts.en:
Marina works as a secretary in a school. She is a single mother, and lives with her mother. For eleven years she has been working every day from 7:00am to 3:00pm. She provides her family with everything they need. 

Currently, she is applying for a loan in order to buy sand, cement, and bricks for construction and repairs on the house where she lives with her family.

Marina's ambition is that through effort, she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement and bricks.

loans.name: Flavio

texts.es:
El señor Flavio tiene 58 años de edad, es casado con tres hijos.

Él es agricultor, se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos como maíz, también es jornalero y a su vez ganadero cuenta con seis semovientes de crianza (vacas), esta actividad la realiza junto con su esposa, quienes tienen más de veinte años de dedicarse ha esta actividad. La familia de Flavio se dedica a la crianza de ganado, él manifiesta que la actividad es patrimonio familiar.

 Flavio posee seis vacas y un terreno donde se alimentan, esta es  alquilada para el pasto de las vacas. Antes de dedicarse a la crianza de ganado, trabajaba la agricultura y a prestar sus servicios como jornal, estas actividades no le eran muy rentables, por eso se dedico a la crianza y comercio de ganado.

El ganado lo compra en los tiangues (lugar donde se comercializa animales) aledaños a la zona que se encuentra a una distancia de dos kilómetros del cantón a la ciudad, cuando los compra en los tiangues, los semovientes son trasladados por la calle arriándolos.

El préstamo será invertido en la compra de dos vacas y materiales de construcción, para continuar la construcción de su vivienda, como 15 bolsas de cemento, 10 quintales de hierro, 1 camionada de arena y 300 ladrillos. Al comprar dos vacas lecheras, la producción de leche será mayor y podrá producir más lácteos para la venta. De esta manera, satisfacera la demanda existente de lácteos y recibirá mejores ingresos, lo que le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida.

Flavio espera continuar con la construcción de ladrillo de su casa, ya que la que tiene es de lámina y tabla de madera y seguir con la crianza de ganado y aumentarlo.
texts.en:
Señor Flavio is 58 years old, married and with 3 children. He is a farmer who grows basic grains such as corn. He also works as a day labourer and breeds livestock (cows); he has 6 cows for breeding. He carries out this activiity together with his wife who has more than 20 years of experience in this work. The Flavio family raises cattle and he says that it is a family business.

Flavio has 6 cows and a plot of land where they feed; the land is leased to graze the cows. Before breeding livestock, he was a farmer and worked as a labourer which wasn't very profitable. This is why he changed to breeding and cattle trade. 

He buys the livestock at 'tiangues' (a place where animals are sold), in an area 2 kms from the canton to the city. When he buys the cows at the flea markets he takes them home herding down the street.

The loan will be invested in buying 2 cows and materials for construction to continue building his house such 15 bags of cement, 10 quintals of iron, 1 truckload of sand & 300 bricks. With buying 2 dairy cows, his milk production will be greater and more milk will be available to sell. In this way, he will satisfy the current demand for milk and receive a better income which will allow him to improve his standard of living.

Flavio hopes to continue building his brick house as the one he currently has is made of laminate and wooden boards. He also hopes to continue breeding livestock and expand this business.

loans.use: to buy 2 cows and materials for construction such 15 bags of cement, 10 quintals of iron, 1 truckload of sand & 300 bricks.

loans.name: Maria Isaura

texts.es: María, nuevamente adquirirá otro crédito, porque necesita invertir  en su negocio y comprara  frutas como: guineos, uvas, papaya, manzanas, a si podrá incrementar más sus ventas y tener más variedad para sus clientes. El anterior crédito le ayudo a mejorar en sus ventas y a obtener mejores ingresos, con eso logro que su familia este mejor económicamente.
texts.en:
María will be getting another loan, because she needs to invest in her business and buy fruit such as bananas, grapes, papayas, and apples. 

This will enable her to increase her sales and have more variety for her clients. The previous loan helped her to improve her sales and obtain better income. With that, she managed to improve her family's financial situation.

loans.use: To buy fruit such as bananas, grapes, papayas and apples.

loans.name: Williams Aguistin

texts.es: Williams Agustín tiene 25 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de taller de refrigeración desde hace mas de 2 años que tiene este negocio. La ubicación es en su vivienda donde asisten la mayoría de sus clientes él está ofreciendo un buen servicio y además los precios son accesibles. Inicio este negocio por su papa que lo apoyo para que William estudiara un técnico y se dedico a realizar este tipo de trabajos. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de dispensadores, vitrinas, condensadores, evaporadores entre otros.
texts.en:
Williams Agustín is 25.  He has had a refrigeration shop for more than two years. It is located in his home, and this where the majority of his customers come. He provides good service, and besides, his prices are affordable. 

He started this business with the help of his father, who supported William in his studies to become a refrigeration technician. Then he began doing this type of work.

The purpose of the loan is to buy ice dispensers, display cases, condensers, evaporators and other equipment.

loans.use: To buy ice dispensers, display cases, condensers, evaporators, and other equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cosmetics, stuffed toys, and fabric.

loans.name: Juan Gilberto

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su familia, es padre de 4 hijos, todos menores de edad, ellos viven en una casa pastoral, él se dedica a la venta de pescado, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 2 años, trabajando de lunes a viernes de 6:00am a 12:00md, surgió la idea del negocio como un medio para obtener ingresos.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pescado fresco, curvina, guapotes, sardina, boca colorada, además comprara verduras como papas, güisquiles, zanahorias, tomates, cebollas; la compra le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, ofreciendo productos frescos a la clientela en verduras y pescado.
Su aspiración es convertirse en un microempresario, con mucha clientela y con experiencia en el comercio.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his family, and is the father of four children, all minors. They live in a simple home.  He sells fish, and has been in this business for two years, working Monday to Friday from 6:00am to noon. The idea for the business came about as a means of earning income. 

He is applying for a loan to buy fresh fish, such as sea bass, guapote, sardines, and snapper.  In addition, he will buy vegetables such as potatoes, güisquiles (pear squash), carrots, tomatoes, and onions. This purchase will help him improve his business, offering fresh fish and vegetables to his customers.  

His ambition is to become a small entrepreneur; with many customers and with experience as a business owner.

loans.use: To buy fresh fish, such as sea bass, guapote, sardines, and snapper.

loans.name: Floresmina

texts.es: Floresmina, D. 48 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy trabajadora, es viuda desD. hace varios años, es madre D. cuatro hijos D. los cuales dos ya son mayores e iniciaron su familia propia, mientras que dos aún viven junto a ella a quienes brinda educación y alimentación. Tiene una casa propia en donD. cría a dos nietos que por diversos motivos no pueden estar con sus padres. EL trabajo D. Floresmina, consiste en la venta D. comida, ella a diario sale a la vereda D. su casa por las noches, pero desD. temprano se va al mercado en donD. hace sus respectivas compras para que por las tardes pueda preparar y salir a vender por las noches. Al principio le fue muy difícil iniciarse en este trabajo, que lleva realizando un par D. años, ella nunca antes se habia dedicado a este tipo D. actividad, ahora está muy orgullosa D. lo que hace ya que sus clientes le retribuyen con muchos halagos a sus deliciosos platos que prepara. Lo que le gusta D. su trabajo es que tiene mucho tiempo para poder dedicar a sus nietos y brindarles los cuidados necesarios, además el flujo D. dinero es diario y es bueno tener ingresos, menciona. Le esta yendo muy bien, tiene muchos buenos clientes y espera poder mantenerse en ese ritmo ya que le es D. mucha ayuda los ingresos que percibe. Este será su crédito número 6 con la institución MFP, esta a la expectativa D. que le den el apoyo necesario D. un préstamo para así poder cumplir con sus objetivos, además se compromete en pagar D. manera puntual sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado, comprará algunos ingredientes e insumos para tenerlos en cantidad ya que D. esa manera podrá obtener productos a menor precio y así obtener mayor ganancia.
texts.en:
Floresmina is 48, and she is a good, kind, and hard-working woman. She has been a widow for several years, and is the mother of four children, two are now adults and have started their own families, while two still live with her, and she provides them with schooling and meals.

She has her own house, where she is raising two grandchildren who for various reasons cannot be with their parents. Floresmina sells food.  Every day in the evenings she goes out on the sidewalk in front of her house.  But early in the day she goes to the market, where she makes her purchases so that she can prepare food in the afternoon, and go out and sell it in the evenings.   

In the beginning, it was very difficult for her to get started in this work, that she has now been doing for a couple of years. She had never done this type of work before, but now she is very proud of what she does, and her customers repay her with many words of praise for the delicious dishes that she prepares.

What she likes about her work is that she is able to devote a lot of time to her grandchildren, and proviD. them with the care they need. In addition, she has a daily cash flow, and she comments that it is good to have an income.

It's going very well for her. She has a lot of good customers, and she hopes to be able to keep going at that rate, as the income she earns is a big help to her. 

This will be her sixth loan with MFP. She is waiting for them to give her the needed loan support, to enable her to meet her objectives. In addition, she is committed to making her instalment payments on time. 

With the amount applied for she will buy a few ingredients and supplies in bulk, as that way, she will be able to obtain better products for less money, and thereby increase her earnings.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and supplies for preparing meals.

loans.name: Willian Humberto

texts.es:
Willian, vive con su esposa y su hijo, solamente Willian trabaja en su casa vendiendo ropa y vitaminas naturales y químicas, este negocio lo comenzó por unos amigos, quienes lo motivaron y hoy en día lo realiza de forma ambulante, sin horario fijo.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa: blusas, faldas, vestidos, entre otros artículos, además comprara energizantes, vitamina b12, complejos b entre otras que son necesA. y muy efectivas para reanimar.
Su aspiración es generar un negocio más grande e incrementar las ganancias, además de siempre estar pendiente de las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Willian lives with his wife and son.  Willian is the only one who is employed in the house, and he sells clothing, as well as natural and chemical vitamins. He started this business because some friends encouraged him, and nowadays he does it door to door, with no fixed hours. 

He is applying for a loan to buy clothing, such as blouses, skirts, dresses, and other items. In addition he will buy energizers, B-12 and B-Complex vitamins, and other products that are necessary and very effective for revitalizing.  His ambition is to generate more business and increase his earnings; besides always looking out for his family's needs.

loans.use: To buy clothing, such as blouses, skirts and dresses.

loans.name: Wastaarabu Group

texts.en:
Pelegrin, who is in his late 20s, is married with one child who goes to school.  He has been running a business of selling chips for one and a half years.  He works from 12 p.m (mid-day) to mid-night daily, and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to buy furniture for his house, pay rent, pay household expenses, and make more chips.  He has paid back all his loans successfully.  He hopes for a loan to buy more sacks of Irish potatoes, one bucket of cooking oil, more trays of eggs, more kilos of meat, and more chicken. His dream is to one day be able to have a big chips business.

He will share this loan with his group "Wastaarabu" which has a total of 18 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of Irish potatoes, one bucket of cooking oil, more trays of eggs, more kilos of meat, and more chicken.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
El señor Gabriel esta empezando a construir su vivienda de material mas duradera y segura y que actual mente tiene una casa de madera, pero ya esta en muy malas condiciones y le preocupa la seguridad de su familia. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para terminar un cuarto y el baño que con sus ahorros pudo iniciar la construcción pero le esta haciendo falta el techo y el desea ponerlo de concreto, pero no cuenta por el momento con el dinero necesario y comprar el material que es (cemento, arena y varilla). 
Don Gabriel tiene ya mas de 20 años dedicándose a la reparación y venta aparatos eléctricos, con una parte de las ganancias planea pagar el crédito y que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia. Ya que su esposa la señora Rosa Alicia de encarga de cuidar y atender a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gabriel is embarking on building his home using the most durable and safe materials. Currently he has a house made of wood, but it is now in very poor condition and he is worried for his family's safety. 

He is applying for a loan to finish a bedroom and a bathroom, the construction of which he was able to start upon using his savings. However, he still needs the roof, which he would like to be concrete, and he does not currently have the money required to buy the materials (cement, sand and rods). 

Gabriel has spent over 20 years repairing and selling electrical appliances for a living, and with a portion of his profits he plans to pay back the loan. This is the only source of income that he has for his family, as his wife Rosa Alicia takes responsibility for looking after their children.

loans.use: to fit a concrete roof in a bedroom and bathroom.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de cerdos, para poder incrementar el negocio, ya que depende de la granja y estos préstamos le han permitido aumentarlo y mantener concentrado para alimentarlos. El préstamo anterior le ayudo para fortalecerse y generar buenas ventas.
Ella está motivada con las inversiones que ha realizado, ya que los préstamos le han dado fortaleza y le han permitido tener una fuente de ingreso más estable para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is soliciting a new loan to buy more pigs, in order to expand her business. She depends on her ranch and these loans have allowed her to augment it and to feed and maintain her herd of pigs. The last loan helped her strengthen the business and generate good sales.

Maria is motivated by her prior investments, since they have provided greater solidity and a more stable source of income for her family.

loans.use: to buy more pigs to raise and sell.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio, nuevamente está solicitando un préstamo, se decidió por que quiere comprar una refrigeradora para el negocio, sabiendo que con estos préstamos él puede ir creciendo poco a poco en el negocio, y también ir haciéndose de sus cosas materiales, Julio ha tenido buena experiencia en el negocio y con la administración de los prestamos, mejorando al lado de su familia.
texts.en: Julio is once again requesting a loan.  He decided to do so because he needs to buy a refrigerator for the business.  He knows that with the loans he can grow gradually in the business and also acquire material things.  Julio has had a good experience with the business and with managing the loans improving alongside his family.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan, se decidió de nuevo a adquirir un nuevo crédito, para que su negocio mejore comprara una cámara nueva para brindar el servicio de videos y fotografias y así darles una buena atención a los clientes. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho ya que logro poner la energía eléctrica y ahora ya pueden ver televisión y de esa forma han logrado vivir mejor con su familia y han mejorado las condiciones que anteriormente no tenían.
texts.en:
Juan has decided to take out another loan. In order to improve his business, he will buy a new camera to offer a video and photography service, and in this way provide a good service to his customers. 

The previous loan helped him a lot, as he was able to install an electricity supply and they can now watch television. As a result, he has been able to enjoy a better quality of life with his family and conditions have improved from before.

loans.use: to buy a new camera.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Rocio pertenece al banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Rocio tiene 34 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Salvación y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella tiene varias actividades económicas en la ciudad de Salvación. Roció trabaja como empleada pública en el centro forestal de la ciudad de Salvación en el área de gerencia, ella también tiene un puesto de venta de artesanía, ella en sus horas libres se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía en su domicilio. Ya es un año que se dedica a la artesanía y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Rocio requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas secas para elaborar collares y pulseras. El sueño de Rocio es exportar sus productos. 

Rocio agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Rocio belongs to the “Del Futuro del Manu” (Of the Future of Manu) communal bank and the members meet every 30 days in the city of Salvacion, Manu province, Madre de Dios department.

Rocio is 34 years old, is in a common law relationship, and has one son. She was born in the city of Salvacion and still lives there. Rocio has various economic activities, all in Salvacion. She is a public employee in the city's forestry center in the management area. Rocio also operates an artisan sales stall. In her free time st home she makes artisan crafts. She has been doing this for a year now and things are going very well, thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

At this opportune moment, Rocio needs a loan to buy dry seeds for making bracelets and necklaces. Her dream is to export her products.

Rocio appreciates and values the loan and promises to comply with her schedule of monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy dry seeds for making bracelets and necklaces to sell.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco, de 55 años, es una hombre bueno, amable y muy responsable. Está casado y es padre de dos hijos quienes son mayores e independiente y uno de ellos tiene ya familia. Tiene una nieta de 15 años quien vive a su lado y depende de él para darle educación y una buena crianza. Él tiene una casa propia en donde brindó lo mejor que tenia a sus hijos y ahora da todo por su nieta. El trabajo de Francisco, consiste en el transporte de carga y pasajeros en su mototaxi, trabajo que realiza dentro y fuera de la ciudad, dependiendo a donde quieren sus eventuales pasajeros. Lleva realizando éste trabajo ya por siete años, y cuando empezó le costo mucho esfuerzo pues no estaba acostumbrado a hacer este tipo de trabajo y tuvo muchos problemas con sus riñones, al pasar el tiempo encontró la manera de poder tener mejor condiciones y ahora es todo un experto. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite manejar su propio horario y darse él mismo descanso necesario cuando lo neccesita; además de poder tener un medio de transporte para su familia. Le esta yendo regular, pues el  negocio esta un poco bajo; pero tiene en mente poner una tienda de abarrotes en su hogar y así poder tener  ingresos adicionales. Este será el crédito número 7 con MFP, Esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Está muy contento con el grupo de trabajo que pertenece ya que todos son muy responsables y sobre todo solidarios entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará piezas para arreglar su mototaxi, además pagará al mecánico que le realizará todos los trabajos, asimismo desea renovar el seguro a su vehículo.
texts.en: Francisco is 55 years old and is a good, kind and responsible man.  He is married and is the father of two grown and independent children, one of which already has his own family.  He has a 15 year old granddaughter who lives with him and depends on him to provide her an education and a good upbringing.  He owns his own house where he offered the best he had to his children and now he is giving everything for his granddaughter.  Francisco's work consists of transporting goods and passengers on his motorcycle taxi, a job that he has been doing for seven years.  When he first began, it was a lot of work for him, as he was not accustomed to doing that type of work.  As a result, he had many problems with his kidneys, but through time he found ways to be able to have better health and now he is an absolute expert.  What he likes about his work is that it allows him to manage his own schedule and to give himself the necessary rest when he needs it, as well as being able to have a way to get around for his family.  It is not going great, as business is a little slow, but he has an idea to put a grocery store in the front of his house and in that way have the ability to earn additional income.  This will be his seventh loan with MFP, and is very happy to know that he will have financial support since in that way he will feel more secure as he moves ahead with his work.  On the other hand he is committed to making his payments, as he has done with previous loans that he has had.  He is very happy with the work group to which he belongs since everyone is very responsible and unified with one another.  With the requested funds, he will purchase parts to repair his motorcycle taxi, as well as pay the mechanic who will complete the repairs.  He also hopes to renew the insurance for his vehicle.

loans.use: To purchase parts and have repairs done by a mechanic, as well as renewing the insurance for his vehicle

loans.name: Good Hope Communal Bank Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal Buena Esperanza está conformado por Susana, Erika, Lorena, María Auxiliadora, Estebana, Yamileth, Aracely, Digna y Vidal. Yamileth que se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos, desde hace más de 4 años que tiene este medio de vida, ella es una persona muy abnegada y disfruta de tener este medio de vida que es necesario para ella y su familia. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de cerdos. Ellas son personas responsables y quieren salir adelante por medio de sus créditos.
texts.en:
The Good Hope Communal Bank is made up of Susana, Erika, Lorena, María Auxiliadora, Estebana, Yamileth, Aracely, Digna and Vidal. 

Yamileth makes a living buying and selling pigs. This has been her livelihood for more than four years. She is a very selfless person and enjoys having this livelihood, which is necessary for her and her family. The purpose of the loan is for the purchase of pigs. 

These women are responsible people and would like to get ahead by means of their loans.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Fortunato

texts.es:
Fortunato pertenece al banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Fortunato tiene 50 años de edad y está casado y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba y desde hace 28 años que radica en la ciudad de Salvación. 

Fortunato trabaja como empleada pública en el Gobierno Regional del departamento de Madre de Dios sede Salvación en el área de administración. Fortunato también tiene una tienda de abarrotes y un hospedaje. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Fortunato requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas más.
 
Fortunato agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Fortuanto belongs to the Communal Bank “Del Futuro del Manu” (Of the Future of Manu). The meetings of his Communal Bank are held every 30 days in the city of Salvación in Manu Province, Department of Madre de Dios.

Fortunato is 50 years old, married, and has three children. He was born in the city of Quillabamba and moved to Salvación when he was 28 years old.

Fortunato works as a public employee for the regional government of the Department of Madre de Dios in Salvación in the administration unit. He also manages a grocery store and an inn. He has been in business for several years and has done very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.

Fortunato is taking this opportunity to request a loan in order to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, and other products. He appreciates and values this loan and promises to complete his monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and other products.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Jessica Maria

texts.es: Jessica es una mujer responsable ella tiene su trabajo que es ser oficinista. El motivo del crédito que solicita es para la compra de materiales de construcción como cemento, baldosas, inodoro, pega entre otros productos. Ella siempre se ha preocupado por brindar a su familia las mejoras necesarias en su vivienda. Sueña con lograr comprar su propia casa, ya que actualmente la casa donde está viviendo es la de su Mama.
texts.en:
Jessica is a responsible woman who has a job as an office worker. 

The purpose of the loan she is asking for is to buy building materials, like cement, floor tiles, a toilet, and glue, among other items. She has always been concerned with providing her family with the necessary improvements for their housing. She dreams of being able to buy her own house, since the house where she is living is actually her mother's.

loans.use: to buy cement, floor tiles, a toilet, and glue, among other items.

loans.name: Reina Dinora

texts.es:
Reina tiene 21 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de 6 meses de edad.

Ella es una joven emprendedora y trabajadora a sus 21 años es madre soltera de una niña de 6 meses de edad. Reina vive con su mamá quien le ha enseñado el manejo de novillos de engorde en repasto y crianza de pollos de engorde, por la razón que no pudo terminar una carrera universitaria. Reina ha encontrado en este trabajo una fuente de ingresos desde hace cinco años.

Ella compra los novillos delgados en un tiangue, para engordarlos. Debe viajar desde su comunidad hasta la ciudad durante una hora en camión, para comprar los animales.

Reina solicita el préstamo, para comprar dos novillos, los cuales pastoreara durante 12 meses, tiempo en el cual debe desparasitarlos, vitaminarlos y darles buen pasto. Para que se desarrollen bien y venderlos a un buen precio. De esta manera ella vendera dos nivillo que ya estan gordos y quedarse con los dos que comprara con el préstamo, con los ingresos ella comprara comida para su hija y ella. Asi Reina no se quedara sin novillos para vender. Ella desea tener varios animales, para realizar ventas más seguidas y asegurar la alimentación de su hija y cancelar su crédito a tiempo.
texts.en:
Reina is 21 years old and a single mother of a daughter 6 months old. She is a young and hardworking entrepreneur who lives with her mother who taught her how to manage bull calves for fattening in pastures and breeding chickens for fattening. As she was unable to finish her university degree, Reina has discovered in this work a source of income for the last 5 years. 

She buys thin bull calves to fatten at a cattle market. In order to buy the animals, she has to travel from where she lives to the city by truck for an hour.

Reina is asking for a loan to buy 2 bull calves which she will put out to pasture for 12 months during which time she will deworm, vitaminize and feed them good patures so that they grow well and she can sell them at a good price. In this way she will sell 2 bull calves that are fat and keep the 2 she will buy with the loan. With the proceeds she will buy food for her daughter and herself. In this way Reina will not run out of calves to sell. She wishes to have various animals, to make sales more often, ensure her daughter has food and pay her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy bull calves for fattening.

loans.name: Meyling Teresa

texts.es: Meyling Teresa tiene 34 años, ella se dedica a brindar sus servicios a una empresa privada, uno de sus mayores problemas ha sido el dejar a su hijo para trabajar pues tiene que dedicarle tiempo a su trabajo. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, clavos, pega, entre otros. Sueña con mejorar cada día su vivienda para que su hijo tenga  donde vivir el mañana.
texts.en:
Meyling Teresa is 34 years old and provides her services at a private company. One of her major problems is leaving her son when she has to go to work so that she can have time to devote to her job.  

The reason for this loan is so that Meyling will be able to buy construction materials such as zinc, nails, glue, and other items.  She dreams of improving her home each day so that her son will have a better place to live in the future.

loans.use: to buy zinc, nails, glue, and other items.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose, de 31 años, es una hombre bueno y amable. Vive con su pareja, con quien tiene un hijo de 9 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, y trabaja mucho para así brindar una buena educación y alimentación a su hijo. El trabajo de José consiste en el alquiler de mototaxi, desde muy temprano se levanta a esperar a sus dos choferes, quienes llevan su mototaxi y trabajan dándole un pago en forma de alquiler a diario. Además de este negocio, él trabaja en una panadería,  ya tiene 5 años realizando esta actividad, y con los años fue ahorrando hasta lograr comprar su mototaxi. Lo que le gusta de su negocio es que le permite tener un ingreso adicional a su economía, ya que a diario ingresa dinero a su casa, le esta yendo bien, además de tener el negocio de alquiler de mototax. Ahora desea dar mantenimiento a su vehiculo y cambiar algunas piezas. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Se compromete en ser un cliente puntual y trabajar bien con el grupo al que pertenece. Con el monto solicitado, comprará piezas para la refacción de su vehiculo, además renovará la documentación del permiso de conducir ya que están a punto de vencerse.
texts.en:
José, 31, is a good, kind man.  He lives with his partner with whom he has a 9-year-old son.  They live together in their own house and he works very much to provide a good education and food for his son.  José works leasing out a mototaxi.  He rises very early to wait for his two drivers who take the mototaxi to work paying him a daily rental fee.   

Besides this business, he also works in a bakery.  He has had this activity for five years and with the passage of the years was able to buy his mototaxi.  What he likes about his work is that it allows him to have an additional source of income because money comes into his house daily.  He’s doing well in addition to having his mototaxi leasing business.

At present, he’d like to service his vehicle and replace some of its parts.  This will be his first MFP loan so he hopes for your collaboration to continue with his goals.  He commits to be very punctual and to work well with the group he belongs to.  He will use the requested amount to buy replacement parts for his vehicle and will also renew the driver’s license that is about to expire.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and to renew his driver’s license.

loans.name: Maria Noemy

texts.es:
María, es madre soltera de una niña de16 años, se dedica a la venta de pupusas y refrescos, ella inicio hace dos años, trabaja todos los días de siete de la mañana a seis de la tarde, aprendió por una amiga y hasta el momento han logrado mantener su hogar.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de quesillo, aceite, condimento, bebidas, esta compra le ayudará para mejorar el negocio, también le ayudará para generar más ganancias.
Ella quiere mantener el negocio, hacerlo crecer y continuar surtiéndolo, también quiere que su familia cuente con mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
María is a single mother of a 16-year old girl. She makes her living selling pupusas (a traditional thick corn tortilla stuffed with fillings) and soft drinks. She started two years ago and works every day from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. She learned from a friend and, up until now, has been able to care for her household. 

Currently she is requesting a loan to purchase quesillo cheese, oil, condiments, and drinks. These purchases will help her improve her business and generate more income.

She wants to be able to maintain her business, make it grow and continue stocking it. She also wants her family to have better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase quesillo cheese, oil, condiments, and drinks.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.es: Anastacia se dedica a ser docente de directora de una escuela, ella es una mujer luchadora que quiere salir adelante. Ella quiere el financiamiento para realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, como cemento, bloques, arena cemento entre otros. Desde hace 6 años que quiere realiza estas mejoras y no había podido construir por falta de dinero. Sueña con terminar de arreglar su vivienda ya que le hacen falta mejoras.
texts.en: Anastacia is a school teacher and principal.  She’s a very hardworking woman who always wants to get ahead.  She wants the loan to buy building materials and supplies like cement, concrete blocks and sand, among others.  She’s wanted to do these improvements for six years but had been unable to do so for lack of money.  She dreams with finishing home improvements because it needs them.

loans.use: to buy cement, concrete blocks and sand, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy underwear, boxer shorts, shirts, and pants.

loans.name: Francisca Miriam

texts.es: Francisca, nuevamente necesita un crédito, debido a la necesidad de desarrollarse en el negocio, comprara más mercadería como: suplementos alimenticios, vitaminas, cereales, con el propósito de ofrecerles  a sus clientes productos que necesitan. El préstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar su inventario y por lo tanto sus ingresos, esto le permitió mejorar en su familia.
texts.en: Francisca needs a loan once again because she needs to develop the business.  She will buy more merchandise like: nutritional supplements, vitamins and cereals to offer her customers the products they need.  The previous loan helped her improve stock inventory and as a result her income which allowed her to improve in her family.

loans.use: to buy nutritional supplements, vitamins and cereals.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro vive con su esposa, aún no tiene hijos, el trabaja vendiendo artesanías, trabaja en feria fuera de los centros escolares, todos los días de la semana. 
El está solicitando renta para la compra de mercaderías como postres, juguete, calcomanías, collares, pulseras, para ofrecer a los clientes mejorando así la atención y el servicio para generar mayores ventas.
Pedro quiere mejorar el negocio, comprar su propio vehículo para trasladar la mercadería.
texts.en: Pedro lives with his wife; they don’t have children yet.  He works as a street vendor selling crafts outside schools every day of the week. He’s asking for the loan to buy merchandise like stud earrings, toys, decals, necklaces and bracelets to offer his customers thus improving service to generate more sales.  Pedro wants to improve the business and to buy his own vehicle to transport the merchandise.

loans.use: to buy stud earrings, toys, decals, necklaces and bracelets.

loans.name: Juan Esteban

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su familia, su esposa y dos hijos, él tiene un negocio con el molino de nixtamal, una granja de cerdos y un taller de refrigeración, aprendió el negocio con unos amigos, trabajando junto a ellos logro aprender y hoy en día administra sus propios negocios.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de repuestos para reparar un molino, él aun desconoce cuáles serán los repuestos que deba comprar, pues el molino debe ser revisado por una persona especializada y con conocimientos en la reparación de molinos, este préstamo le ayudara para poder darle mantenimiento a esta máquina para continuar prestando servicios a los clientes.
La aspiración de Juan es mantener los negocios con la ayuda de los préstamos, tanto la granja, el molino y el taller, son las fuentes de ingresos que desea mantener por un largo tiempo, para poder proveer a su familia lo necesario.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his family: his wife and two children.  He has a corn mill, a pig farm and a refrigeration shop.  He learned the business with some friends.  By working alongside them he learned and now he runs his own businesses.

He’s asking for the loan to buy spare parts to repair a mill.  He still doesn’t know what these parts he’ll have to buy will be because the mill has to be examined by a specialist who knows how to repair mills.  The loan will help him service the machine and continue providing service to customers.

Juan’s hope is to keep the businesses, the farm, mill and shop, going with help from the loans.  They are his sources of income that he’d like to have for a long time to provide his family with what’s needed.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair a mill.

loans.name: Jenny Nohemy

texts.es:
Jenny, vive con su familia, su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella administra en su casa una granja de cerdos,  este negocio comenzó por iniciativa propia, para tener una ocupación y de ella una fuente de ingresos para cubrir algunos gastos de su familia.
Ella comprara tres cerdos y concentrado, para la granja, por eso solicita un préstamo para realizar la inversión, esto le permitirá ampliar el negocio y mejorar la atención a la clientela.
El propósito de Jenny es tener un negocio grande, ampliar el número de cerdos y el tamaño del corral, dándoles mejores cuidados para hacer mejor venta.
texts.en:
Jenny lives with her family: her husband and three children.  She has a pig farm at home that she manages.  The business started on her own initiative in order to have an occupation of her own and a source of income to cover some of the family expenses.

She will buy three pigs and feed concentrate for the farm.  This is why she needs a loan to make this investment that will allow her to expand the business and improve customer service.

Jenny’s goal is to have a large business, to increase the number of pigs and the size of her corral, providing better care for them so that sales will be better.

loans.use: to buy three pigs and feed concentrate.

loans.name: Sonia Carolina

texts.es:
Sonia, por la buena atención D. nuestra institución, se ha decidido nuevamente a otro préstamo, porque quiere invertir más en su negocio ya que está bien para esta época por las graduaciones comprara: productos D. belleza, maquillajes, cremas, zapatos, y ropa, el propósito D. ella es tener lo necesario para ofrecerles a los clientes.
Los préstamos anteriores le ayudaron mucho para crecer y tener más mercadería, este avance le ha permitido cambiar las condiciones D. vida D. su familia y a tener lo necesario para que no les falte nada.
texts.en: Sonia, thanks to the good attention from our institution, has decided on another loan once again because she wants to invest more in her business because during this season of graduations she will buy beauty products, make-up, creams, shoes and clothes to have what’s necessary to offer her customers.  Previous loans helped her much to grow and have more merchandise.  This advance has maD. it possible for her to change her family’s living conditions and to have everything they need and not lack anything.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, shoes and clothes.

loans.name: Isabel Montoya

texts.es:
Isabel, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, ella tiene un negocio donD. ofrece productos D. primera necesidad, lo atienD. D. 7:00am a 6:00pm, ella instalo el negocio por necesidad, ya que su objetivo es apoyar a su esposo para sacar a sus hijos adelante.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería como harinas, pastas, aceite, galletas, carnes, embutidos, azúcar, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, surtiéndolo D. productos para obtener mejores ventas con todos sus clientes.
Ella quiere seguir trabajando con préstamos, por esto se proyecta para hacer todo lo posible por administrar bien el negocio y los fondos del préstamo.
texts.en:
Isabel lives with her husband and three children.  She has a business where she sells basic staple items; she’s open from 7am until 6pm.  She opened the business because of need for her objective is to help her husband support their children.

She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise like flour, pasta, oil, cookies, meat, cured meats and sugar.  This purchase will help her improve the business stocking it with products to obtain better sales with all her customers.  

She wants to continue to work with loans so she projects doing everything possible to manage the business and the funds from the loan well.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Santos Elias

texts.es:
Santos, necesita otro crédito, porque lo invertirá en su negocio y comprara: leña, maíz, el propósito D. ella es que su negocio siempre se mantenga estable y mantener siempre a sus clientes. 
Los préstamos anteriores le ayudaron a mejorar su estilo D. vida ya que los ingresos son diarios, esto le permitió que su familia viva en mejores condiciones que antes.
texts.en: Santos needs another loan because she’ll invest it in her business.  She will buy firewood and corn. Her goal is that he business is always stable and to retain her customers.  Previous loans helped her improve her standard of living because income is daily.  This allowed her family to live in conditions that are better than they were before.

loans.use: to buy firewood and corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy place settings, flour, chicken and potatoes.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
La señora Rosa María tiene 35 años de edad, es originaria y reside en el Barrio San Jorge del municipio de Intibucá departamento de Intibucá,  es madre soltera de dos niños que se encuentra en edad escolar.
