Es cliente activa de ODEF desde el mes de junio del año 2005 y no ha presentado ningún problema con sus pagos. Ha manejado un promedio de dieciocho préstamos con la institución, siendo cliente categoría “AAA". 
Las actividades que ella realizan son la venta de productos de la canasta básica (pulpería). El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y tiene más de nueve años de funcionamiento por lo que demuestra ser un negocio estable.

Actualmente ha solicitado nuevamente un préstamo el que utilizara para surtir su negocio comprando productos alimenticios. Ella espera incrementar sus ventas y con las ganancias mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa María, 35, es originally from and still live in the San Jorge neighborhood of Intibucá municipality, Intibucá Department.  She’s a single mother of two children who are school aged.

She’s been an active ODEF client since June, 2005 and has never had a problem with her repayments.  She’s averaged 18 payments with the institution and she’s a “AAA” category client.

The activity she carries out is selling basic staple items (groceries).  The business is home-based and she’s been in operation for more than nine years so it’s a stable business.

At present she’s asking for a loan once again to stock the business buying foodstuffs.  She hopes to increase sales and improve her quality of life with the profits.

loans.use: Compra de productos alimenticios

loans.name: Teofila Irma

texts.es: Teofila Irma tiene 46 años, su actividad es la venta de ropa interior desde hace más de 15 años que tiene este negocio. Inicio con muy poco capital de trabajo a pesar de que siempre ha tenido dificultades pues tiene un hijo de 18 años bajo su cargo. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de biquinis, trajes de baño, hilos dentales, entre otros productos. Sueña con mejorar sus ingresos cada día.
texts.en:
Teofila Irma is 46 years old.  Her job is selling underwear.  She has had this business for more than 15 years.  She began with very little working capital despite always having problems since she has an 18-year-old son in her care.

The loan she is requesting is to buy bikinis, bathing suits, and thongs, among other products.

She dreams about improving her income every day.

loans.use: to buy bikinis, bathing suits, thongs, and other products.

loans.name: Claudia Lisseth

texts.es:
Claudia, por la buena atención D. nuestra institución se ha decidido a obtener un nuevo crédito, y porque quiere mantener su negocio estable debido que tiene una granja D. cerdos, actualmente comprara más cerdos pequeños, para crecerlos, el propósito D. ella es venderlos al mercado a buen precio.
Los financiamientos anteriores le ayudaron a aumentar el nivel D. ventas esto le permitió cambiar las condiciones D. vida D. ella y su familia.
texts.en: Because of the good service she’s gotten from our institution, Claudia has decided to get a new loan because she wants to maintain her business stable.  She has a pig farm and wants to buy more piglets to raise so that she can sell them for a good price at market.  Previous loans helped her increase sales which allowed her to change her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Freddy Leonel

texts.es: Freddy Leonel tiene 39 años, él se dedica a brindar el servicio de contratista. Desde hace más de 11 años que tiene este medio de vida,  él siempre está pensando en el bienestar de su familia pues quiere seguir progresando diariamente. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de camión pues es necesario para llevar todas las herramientas necesarias. Sueña con seguir creciendo con su negocio.
texts.en: Freddy Leonel is 39 years old and works as a contractor.  He’s had this line of work for over 11 years.  He is always thinking of ways to improve his family’s wellbeing  because he wants to continue making progress daily.  The reason for the loan is to buy a truck that he needs to carry all the necessary tools.  He dreams with continuing to grow in his business.

loans.use: to buy a truck.

loans.name: Alejandro Antonio

texts.es: Alejandro Antonio tiene 42 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de moto taxi. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio, él tiene que trabajar todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche pues siempre le ha preocupado el obtener ganancias para su hogar. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de llantas, focos entre otros productos que son necesarios para su medio de trabajo. Sueña con obtener otra moto taxi.
texts.en: Alejandro Antonio is 42 years old.  His job is offering motorcycle taxi services.  He has had this business for more than five years.  He has to work every day from 7 in the morning until 9 at night because he has always been worried about getting profits for his home.  The reason for the loan is to buy tires and lights, among other products that are necessary for his work.  He dreams of getting another motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to buy tires, lights, and other products.

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es: La socia Maruja sigue administrando su fotocopiadora, aqui realizan trabajos como tipeos, fotocopias, escaneos, grabados a DVD, CDs, impresiones entre los trabajos frecuentes que piden los clientes, la socia desea implematar su fotocopiadora  para recibir a mas clientela a futuro cercano, en esta ocasion la socia desea el prestamo para invertir en la compra D. papel A-4, tintas para las impresiones y D. este modo seguir creciendo con el negocio.
texts.en: Member Maruja continues working with her photocopier.  She does jobs such as typing, copies, scans, recordings on DVDs. CDS, printing, among all the types of work her customers request.  She wishes to set up another photocopier to attract more customers in the near future.  This time the member requests a loan to buy A-4 paper, printer's ink, and in this way, keep her business growing.

loans.use: to buy A-4 paper, and printer's ink so that her business can keep growing.

loans.name: Eva Rosa

texts.es:
Eva de 55 años, empezó con una tienda de víveres hace 1 año atrás porque en el sector no había tiendas, además se ayuda vendiendo productos yambal.

Una mujer muy fuerte trabaja de lunes a domingo de 8am hasta las 7pm. Gracias a Dios Eva no ha tenido ningún problema de salud ni de delincuencias. Eva cría solo a su hijo debido a que su esposo trabajo en un barco y sale de viaje por largos tiempos. Ella desea comprar con el prestamo arroz, bebidas, granos, aceite etc. 

Su sueño que desea alcanzar es poder mejorar su vivienda para poder vivir más tranquila con su familia.
texts.en:
Eva, 55, started a convenience store one year ago because there were no other stores in the area.  Moreover, she was helped through her sales of Yanbal cosmetic products.

She is a very strong woman who works Monday to Sunday, from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m. Thankfully, Eva has not had any problems such as issues regarding her health or criminal activity.  She raised her son alone because her husband worked on a boat and was away for long periods of time. She wants to use the loan to buy rice, drinks, grains, oil, etc. 

Her dream is to be able to make improvements on her house so she can live more comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, drinks, grains, oil, etc.

loans.name: Saturninio

texts.es:
Don Saturninio, sigue con su trabajo en seguridad,  su esposa laborando en zona franca y sus hijos terminando el año escolar, para el la construccion de su vivienda ha sido su pioridad, en donde esta contento por que con el financiamiento que  hizo, pudo levantar su casa de concreto, logrando mejor seguridad y estabilidad de vivienda.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo podra comenzar un muro perimetral, el cual ya comenzo el arranque y que quiere terminar, hasta donde alcance el material,  para tener mas segura su propiedad, menos robos, e ir mejorando cada dia, es su meta junto a su familia. Ya que ambos se esfuerzan para ahorrar y cubrir las necesidades.
texts.en:
Saturninio continues working in security, his wife continues working in the free trade zone and his children are concluding the school year. His priority has been the construction of his house and he is happy about the funding he has received. He was able to construct a concrete house, thereby acquiring improved security and stability in his living arrangements.

Today, with this new loan, he will be able to work on a wall around the perimeter, which he has already started with the material he had, and he wants to finish it in order to make his property more secure, insure against robberies and continue improving every day. This is the goal he shares with his family, which is now in a position to save and cover the basic necessities.

loans.use: to build a perimeter wall, providing more security for his property and his family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy dry grains, soup, canned goods, soft drinks, bread, matches, noodles and eggs.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: La socia Maria, sigue trabajando con la compra y venta de materiales de construcci{on, la socia compra al por mayor ladrillos, cemento, bloquetas, arena, fierros,la socia en esta ocasi{on tambien desea invertir el prestamo junto a un ahorro que tiene guardado para aumentar en el primer pago para el envio de los materiales de construccion a la socia, la socia comprara cemento, fierros, arena, ladrillos y los traeran de Arequipa y Juliaca, la socia pagara el primer envio y para ello requiere el prestamo para aumentar a lo que tiene, ella desea implementar a futuro su negocio y mejorar sus ventas y seguir creciendo.
texts.en: Our member, Maria, buys and sells construction materials.  She buys wholesale supplies of bricks, cement, cement blocks, sand, iron bar, etc.  She plans to combine the loan with her own savings to make an initial payment for the merchandise she needs.  She will use the funds to buy cement, iron bar, sand and bricks in Arequipa and Juliaca that she will then sell locally.  She needs the loan to cover the amount she needs over and above her savings.  For the future, she wants to establish a solid business and grow it year in and year out.

loans.use: to stock her construction supplies business.

loans.name: Carlos Efren

texts.es:
Carlos de 43 años, es maestro cerrajero empezó este negocio hace 10 años atrás ya que lo aprendió de un amigo y siguió adelante con sus esfuerzos.

Trabajo solo todos los días sin horarios fijos. Las dificultades de su negocio son las enfermedades que se dan debido al trabajo que realiza.

Está casado y tiene 3 hijos (3, 14, 17, 18 años). El prestamo lo quiere para comprar varillas, estructuras metálicas y latas de metal para su  cerrajería. Sus metas a alcanzar es seguir adelante en su negocio sin ningún problema para poder sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos, 43, is a master locksmith.  He learned the relevant skills from a friend and has owned his own business for 10 years now.

He works alone every day for as long as it takes to finish the work he has.  His biggest concern is the illnesses that are common to men and women in this line of work.

Carlos is married and has 3 children (3-, 14-, 17- and 18-years old).  He will use the loan to buy the supplies he needs for the business.  His goal is to continue operating the business and avoid any obstacles that might limit his ability to support his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his metal shop.

loans.name: Luciana Fredesvinda

texts.es:
Luciana de 46 años, Con la ayuda de Dios Logro establecer una papelería en su casa la cual ya lleva trabajando 15 años.

Sus hijos le ayudan a trabajar todos los días de 7am hasta las 10pm. Gracias a dios no ha presentado ningún problema. Es madre soltera que saca adelante a sus dos hijas (14 y 24 años) que están estudiando.

Con el prestamo quiere comprar cuadernos, plumas etc. La meta que desea alcanzar es poder incrementar mas su negocio y vivir tranquilamente con sus dos hijas.
texts.en:
Luciana, 46, with God's help managed to set up a stationery store in her house.  She has been doing this work for 15 years.

Her children help her work every day from 7 a.m. until 10 p.m.  Thanks to God the store hasn't presented any problems.  She is a single mother who gets her two daughters ahead; they are 14 and 24 years old, and they are students.

With the loan she wants to buy notebooks, pens, etc.  The goal she wants to reach is to be able to increase her business more and live peacefully with her two daughters.

loans.use: to buy notebooks and pens.

loans.name: Jeanet Del Socorro

texts.es: Jeaneth Del Socorro tiene su negocio que es la venta de ropa nueva. Desde hace más de 21 años que tiene de poseer este medio de vida, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y le da mucho orgullo el tener su propio negocio. Ella tiene su negocio establecido en el mercado en donde la mayoría de sus clientes saben que ella siempre está ofreciendo buen servicio y precios accesibles. El crédito es para la compra de ropa interior, camisas para mujeres, vestidos, faldas, trajes para niños entre otros.
texts.en: Jeaneth Del Socorro sells new clothing. She has done this for over 21 years. She is a very hard-working person and she is very proud to have her own business. Her business is established in a market, and the majority of her customers know that she is always there, offering a good service and accessible prices. This loan is for the purchase of underwear, women's shirts, dresses, skirts, and children's outfits, among other items.

loans.use: to buy underwear, women's shirts, dresses, skirts, and children's outfits.

loans.name: Marleni Vanessa

texts.es: La socia a cambiado de rubro en estos ultimos meses, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta por catalogos de productos de belleza, la socia es docente de pofesion y estuvo en otro rubro de negocio propio criando pollospero ahora le vio mas rentabilidad a la venta de productos por catalogo. Ells desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de perfumes, cremas y otros que estan en oferta para poder almacenarlo y venderlo mas adelante a un costo razonable.
texts.en: A few months ago, Marleni entered a new area of business. She sells beauty products through a catalogue. She is a teacher by profession and used to raise chickens. However, she has seen that it is more profitable to sell products through a catalogue. She wants to invest this loan in the purchase of perfumes, creams, and other items which are currently on sale, so that she can stock up and sell them later at a reasonable price.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Marlin Del Socorro

texts.es: Marlin del Socorro su negocio es la venta de ropa usada, desde hace más de 6 años que tiene esta actividad. Ella tiene 2 hijos de los cuales solamente 1 está bajo su cargo. El reto de Marlin de vender sus productos cada día para ofrecerle a su familia el pan de cada día es muy difícil pero ella no se desanima a seguir luchando. Es por eso que realiza este crédito para la compra de pantalones, faldas, vestidos, trajes, shorts, camisetas y algunas tallas de prendas de vestir extra grande que algunos clientes le solicitan.
texts.en: Marlin del Socorro has sold used clothing for six years. She has two children, of whom only one is under her care. Marlin's challenge is to sell her products every day in order to provide her family's daily bread. This is very difficult, but she is not discouraged and keeps fighting. For this reason, she is taking out a loan for the purchase of pants, skirts, dresses, suits, shorts, shirts, and some extra-large items which some of her customers request.

loans.use: to buy pants, skirts, dresses, dresses, shorts, and shirts.

loans.name: Jason Angel

texts.es:
Jason de 22 años, aprendió la fabricación de waipes (telas utiles para construccion y pintura) gracias a la ayuda de su madrina quien trabaja en su casa sin ninguna incomodidad.

Trabaja solo de todos los días de 2pm a 6pm. No está casado trabaja solamente para el bienestar de su futuro.

Con el prestamo quiere comprar telas, herramientas para la elaboracion de los waypes. Su meta es seguir trabajando en este negocio para poder seguir adelante y poder abrir un sucursal en otro lado.
texts.en:
Jason, age 22, learned to make waipes (useful fabric used in painting and construction) with the help of his godmother, who works very comfortably from home.

Jason works alone every day from 2:00 pm to 6:00 pm. He is not married, so he works only for his own benefit.

With this loan, he wants to buy fabric and tools for making the waipes. His goal is to keep working in this business in order to keep getting ahead. He wants to be able to open another store in another area.

loans.use: to buy fabric and tools.

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
Maria de 37 años, el negocio de ventas de desayuno lo empezó con la ayuda de su hermano quien la animaba todos los días, y hasta ahora le ha ido muy bien.

Trabaja con la ayuda de su esposo de lunes a domingo desde las 5:30 hasta las 11am. Esta felizmente casada y tiene 5 hijos (4, 13, 15, 17, 19 años).

Con el prestamo quiere comprar productos lácteos, ventanas y puertas para el negocio. Su única meta es poder tener un lugar estable para poder trabajar sin ningún problema y seguí adelante con su esposo.
texts.en:
Maria, age 37, started her breakfast sales business with the help of her brother, who encouraged her every day. It has gone very well for her so far.

She works, with her husband's help, every day of the week from 5:30 am - 11:00 am. She is happily married and has 5 children ages 4, 13, 15, 17, and 19.

With this loan, she wants to buy dairy products, as well as windows and doors for her business. Her only goal is to be able to have a stable location to work, without any problems, and to keep moving forward.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, as well as windows and doors for her business.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: La socia tambien tiene su negocio D. venta D. materiales D. construccion, ela a ampliado su negocio y en esta ocasion desea invertir en la compra D. cemento, fierros, arena; La socia tambien venD. materiales D. ferreteria como clavos, pinturas entre otors. La socia requiere el prestamo para invertir en la compra D. materiales para la implementacion D. su negocio D. venta D. materiales y ferreteria. La socia comprara arena, cemento, clavos, pinturas entre otros materiales.
texts.en: The member also has her building materials and supplies business.  She has expanded the business and on this occasion wants to invest in the purchase of cement, rebar and sand.  She also sells hardware supplies like nails and paint, among others.  She needs the loan to invest in materials to stock her building materials and hardware supplies business.  She will buy cement, sand, nails and paint, among other materials.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, nails, paint and other materials.

loans.name: Primitivo

texts.es: El socio sigue trabajando prestando servicio de taxi a los clientes en la ciudad de Cusco, y con su trabajo el educa a sus hijos y les brinda todo tipo de comodidades, el socio desea ver a sus hijos profesionales y seguir teniendo fuerzas para trabajar. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de una llanta y en el mantenimiento de su vehiculo.
texts.en: The member continues providing taxi services to customers in the city of Cusco.  He is able to provide schooling and all sorts of comforts for his children.  He wants to see his children become professionals and he wants to continue to have strength to keep working.  He asks for the loan to buy a tire and to service his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy a tire and service the car.

loans.name: José Dolores

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 30 años de edad, es casado con cuatro hijos.

Él vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos. Desde los 14 años de edad aprendió a manejar en la escuela donde estudiaba. Después de casarse su vida ha sido de mucho esfuerzo, para sacar a su familia adelante, se levanta a las 4:30 de la mañana a prepararse y salir a recoger a los niños de su colonia, que lleva a la escuela en su microbús escolar, luego a la mediodía pasa a recoger a los niños de la escuela para llevarlos a sus hogares. Los fines de semana los dedica a la toma de fotografías y videos que él mismo edita en eventos como boda, cumpleaños, graduaciones, etc. Él solo desea brindarle lo mejor a su familia.

José solicita un préstamo, para invertirlo en la compra de otro motor, para su vehiculo, pues el que tiene es de seis pistones y le consume mucho combustible. Él desea comprar uno de cuatro pistones y de diesel. De esta manera ahorrara en combustible y ofrecerá un buen servicio a sus clientes con mejor precio, lo que le generara mayores ingresos, para su familia. 

José ahorrara lo más que pueda, para comprar un microbús más grande, pues cada día hay más niños en su colonia que viajan a la escuela. Además sueña con que sus hijas se gradúen y sean profesionales, pues es la herencia que les dejara.
texts.en:
Señor José is 30 years old, married and has 4 children. He lives with his wife and 4 children. When he was 14 years old he learned how drive at the school he attended. Since getting married his life has been a constant struggle to take care of his family. He gets up at 4:30 in the morning and goes to collect the children in his neighbourhood in his school minibus. Later, at midday, he goes and collects the children at school to take them home. The weekends are spent taking photos and videos at events such as weddings, birthdays, graduations, etc., which he edits himself. He only wants to give his family the best.

José is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of another engine for his vehicle as the one he has has 6 pistons and uses too much petrol. He wants to buy a 4 cylinder diesel engine. In this way he will save on petrol and offer his customers a good service, at a better price which will generate a better income for his family.

José saves as much as he can to buy a bigger minibus as there are more children every day in his neighbourhood that travel to school. He also dreams of his daughters graduating and becoming professionals as this will the inheritance he leaves them.

loans.use: to buy a 4 cylinder diesel engine for his school minibus.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy firewood, clay and nacazcol.

loans.name: Marilu

texts.es: La socia continua administrando su negocio de venta de materiales de construccion, ella compra ormigon, cemento, arena al por mayor y desea implementar su negocio y tambien comprar cemento, ladrilos, arena en esta ocasion la socia desea invertir en la compra de estos materiales.
texts.en: The member continues managing her building materials and supplies business.  She buys concrete, cement and sand at wholesale and she wants to equip her business and also to buy cement, bricks and sand.  On this occasion she wants to invest in the purchase of these materials.

loans.use: to equip her business and also to buy cement, bricks and sand.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es: Gilberto, solicita otro crédito, porque nuevamente lo invertirá en la agricultura y comprara: cuatro sacos de abono, herbicidas y semilla para la siembra, el objetivo de él es mejorar la producción y que hayan más ingresos. Los financiamientos anteriores le han ayudado salir adelante y tener buenas cosechas, esto le permitió estar estable económicamente y poder darle lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en: Gilberto is requiring another loan because he wants to again invest in his agricultural business. He will buy: four bags of fertilizer, herbicides and seeds to plant. His goal is to improve his production and have a greater income. His previous loans have helped him to forge ahead and have good crops, which have enabled him to be economically stable and be able to provide his family with necessities.

loans.use: to buy four bags of fertilizer, herbicides and seeds.

loans.name: Juan Tomas

texts.es:
Juan de 27 años, comenzó el negocio de ventas de productos naturales, ya que su hija estaba enferma y estos productos se hicieron bien para su recuperación.

Realizo este trabajo con la ayuda de su esposo todos los días sin horarios fijos. Gracias a Dios no ha tenido ningún problema de salud ni de delincuencia. 

Está casado y tiene una hermosa niña de 2 años de edad. Con el prestamo quiere comprar productos naturales como vitaminas, dirigidos para el sistema digestivo, problemas del corazon etc. Su meta a alcanzar es poder tener un lugar  fijo para poder trabajar sin dificultades.
texts.en:
Juan, 27, started a business selling natural products because his daughter was ill and these products worked well for her recuperation.  He carries out the work with help from his wife every day with no fixed work schedule.  Thanks to God he’s had neither health problems nor problems with crime.

He is married and has a beautiful, 2-year-old daughter.  He wants to use the loan to buy natural products like vitamins that are designed for the digestive system, for heart problems, etc.  His goal is to manage to have a fixed locale to work in problem-free.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and natural medicinal products.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel, nuevamente se decidió a  tener otro crédito, porque tiene el plan de incrementar sus ventas y tener más clientes, para esto comprara  mercadería como: pantalones, camisas, faldas, blusas, ropa interior, el propósito de él es ofrecer a sus clientes  variedad saisfaciendo sus gustos y demandas.
Los financiamientos anteriores le han ayudado a ampliar su negocio, tener más clientela, este avance le permitió mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia.
texts.en: Miguel decided once again to have a loan because he plans to increase sales and have more customers.  To do so, he will buy merchandise like pants, shirts, skirts, blouses and underwear aiming to have more variety available to offer his customers meeting their demand and particular tastes.  Previous loans have helped him expand the business, to have more clientele and this advance helped him improve his family’s economic condition.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Karla Eugenia

texts.es: Karla tiene 33 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de León, ella es comerciante tiene un pulpería en su casa de habitación, madre de dos hijos, casada, su esposo es mecánico trabaja en una zona franca. Ella inicio sus actividades económicas hace tres años lo puso con el dinero de su liquidación de su anterior trabajo, estaba cansada de horarios inestables y agresiones laborales que sufrió así que decidió emprender su propio negocio donde ella es su propio jefe.  Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar productos lácteos, granos básicos, cosméticos, perfumes para aprovechar los meses de noviembre y diciembre que es cuando las ventas incrementan y necesita productos para ofertar. En sus expectativas esta comprar un freezer nuevo que tenga capacidad de almacenar mas productos como lácteos, jugos, gaseosas, pollo, comprar 2 vitrinas para exhibir sus productos y trabajar cada día para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Karla is 33 years old and lives in the city of León. She is a merchant and has a grocery store in her home. She is the mother of two children. She is married and her husband is a mechanic who works in the free zone. 

She began her business activities three years ago putting in the money after quitting a previous job. She was tired of working an unstable schedule and suffered from work problems and so she decided to start her own business where she is her own boss.

She is asking for a loan to buy dairy products, basic grains, cosmetics, and perfumes in order to take advantage of the months of November and December when sales go up and she needs products to offer. 

She anticipates one day buying a new freezer in order to have the capacity to store more products such as dairy products, juices, soft drinks, chicken and to buy two display cases in order to show her products. 

She works every day in order to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy products such dairy, basic grains, cosmetics and perfumes

loans.name: Washington Javier

texts.es:
Washington de 37 años, trabaja como chofer de un servicio de transporte de tricimoto hace 1 año y 3 mese atrás y gracias A dios le ha ido muy bien.

El único problema es la delincuencia ya que recorre sectores peligros en su vehículo. No está casado solo trabaja para no tener ningún problema en el futuro.

El prestamo lo quiere para comprar herramientas para su tricimoto y darle mantenimiento. Su meta alcanzar es poder comprar su propia tricimoto para poder trabajar para el mismo y asi poder terminar de construir la casa en el terreno de su hermano.
texts.en:
Washington, 37, has worked as a mototaxi driver for the last year and three months; thanks be to God, he’s done very well.  The only problem is crime because he travels through dangerous sectors in his vehicle.  He is not married and works so that he will not have any problem in the future.

He needs the loan to buy tools for his mototaxi and to service it.  His goal is to be able to buy his own mototaxi so that he can work for himself and finish building the house on his brother’s lot.

loans.use: to repair his trimotor and buy tools.

loans.name: Sergio Regino

texts.es: Sergio Regino tiene 62 años, el un hombre pensionado el motivo del crédito que realiza es para realizarle mejoras a su vivienda ya que quiere construir un cuarto y colocar cerámica necesita comprar cemento, pega, pago de mano de obra. Es una persona que siempre está motivada por el cambio el deseo de superación personal, Sergio necesita realizar estas remodelaciones que son necesarias en su vivienda. Sueña con seguir proporcionando mejoras a su hogar.
texts.en: Sergio Regino is 62 years old, on a pension, and is asking for a loan in order to improve his housing as he wants to build a room and to lay down ceramic, and he needs to buy cement, glue, and to pay for the labor. He is a person that always is motivated by the desire for personal success. Sergio needs to make these renovations to his house. He dreams of continuing to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: to buy ceramic, cement, glue, and to pay for the labor

loans.name: Nerida

texts.es: La socia sigue con su negocio de artesania y venta de tejidos, la socia compra la artesania ya hecha y otro grupo lo elabora ella misma, la socia realiza bellos trabajos con sus manos hechos en lana de ovino, alpaca y sinteticos; ella hacegorros con diseños tipicos, guantes, chalinas, mantas cortas y largas. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de lanas de alpaca bebe, lana de oveja, lana sintetica, para la elaboracion de sus trabajos para estas fiestas navideñas.
texts.en: The member continues with her crafts and textile sales business.  She buys the crafts already made and the other items she makes herself.  She makes beautiful, hand-crafted sheep, alpaca and synthetic wool items.  She makes caps with traditional designs, gloves, shawls, short and long blankets.  She’s asking for the loan to buy baby alpaca wool, sheep’s wool and synthetic wool to make her crafts for the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy baby alpaca wool, sheep's wool and synthetic wool.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Gloria Catalina

texts.es:
Gloria de 38 años, con la ayuda de Dios empezó con el negocio hace 7 años en su propia casa para ayudar con los gastos de su familia y ser una fuente más de ingreso.

Trabaja sola todos los días. Gracias a Dios no ha tenido ningún problema. Es una madre soltera con tres hijos (2, 9, 16 años) quien trabaja muy duro para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos.

Con el prestamo quiere comprar crema, cosmeticos, perfumes. Su meta es poder tener un bazar para que tenga más ayuda de su negocio y también poder hacer la loza de su casa para poder vivir más cómodos.
texts.en:
Gloria, 38, with God’s help started the business 7 years ago at home to help cover family expenses and to have another source of income.  She works alone every day.  Thanks to God there have been no problems.  She’s a single mother with three children (2, 9 and 16 years old) who works very hard to be able to raise her children.

She will use the loan to buy cream, cosmetics and perfume.  Her goal is to have a store to get more help from her business and also to install tile in her house so that they can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta D. ropa, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, este negocio D. María inicio hace 6 años, dedicándose a tiempo completo, durante todos los días D. la semana, la fuente D. ingreso que tiene su familia es este negocio.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería, comprando faldas, vestidos, pantalones, blusas y  zapatos, esta inversión será un gran aporte para María, mejorando su condicione D. comerciante y la diversidad que ofrecerá para los clientes.
La aspiración D. María tener su propio local, ya que tiene un puesto en la calle y por eso su sueño es tener un local propio  y adecuado para atender la demanda.
texts.en: María works selling clothing.  She lives with her husband and three children.  María started her business 6 years ago, dedicating herself full-time, every day of the week.  This business is her family's only source of income.  Currently she needs a loan in order to purchase merchandise, including skirts, dresses, pants, blouses and shoes.  This investment will be a great help for María, improving her condition as a merchant and increasing the diversity that she can offer to clients.  María's goal is to have her own shop, since she currently has a street cart and thus her dream is to have her own store and for it to be adequate to meet demand.

loans.use: To purchase skirts, dresses, pants, blouses and shoes.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su esposa y sus hijos quienes son independientes, él se dedica a atender un taller de ojalatería y herrería, haciendo machetes, hachas, cuchillos, este trabajo lo realiza de 5:00pm a 10:00pm, las ventas las realiza los fines de semana en el mercado municipal.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de carbono y hierro, para la elaboración de machetes, barra, asadores,  el préstamo será un gran aporte económico para Manuel, ya que comprara lo necesario para la elaboración de las herramientas que muchos clientes le solicitan.
Su aspiración es convertir el taller más grande de la zona, atender la demanda de muchos clientes, y capacitándose para mejorar la ejecución de su trabajo.
texts.en: Manuel lives with his wife and his children who are adults.  He works in a tin and blacksmith shop, making machetes, axes, and knives.  He works daily from 5:00pm to 10:00pm.  He sells his work on the weekends in the city market.  Currently he is requesting a loan to purchase coal and iron in order to make machetes, poles, and grills.  The loan will be a great economic help to Manuel, since he will buy what is needed to make the tools that many clients request.  His goal is to make his shop the largest one in the area, to meet the demand of many clients, and to increase his skills in executing his work.

loans.use: To purchase coal and iron

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es: La socia actualmente ha crecido en su negocio y sin cambiar D. rubro sigue dedicada a la elaboracion D. ricas tortas y bocaditos entre salados y dulces, la socia tambien sigue tejiendo chompas D. lana, con finos acabados y aunque los realiza en sus ratos libres ella siempre tiene su tejido entre manos, la socia es muy cotizada por sus clientes para la elaboracion D. tortas y bocaditos para todo tipo D. reuniones; La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra D. ingredientes, fuentes, productos D. decoracion D. tortas y comprar lanas, botones y tejidos nuevos. La socia desea seguir creciendo y a futuro cercano poner un stand para exhibir sus productos.
texts.en: This member has grown her business and without changing paths. She continues to earn her living making delicious cakes and appetizers, both salty and sweet.  She also has continued knitting wool sweaters with smooth finishing.  Although she makes the sweaters in her free moments, she's always got her knitting in hand.  Guillermina is quite sought-after by her customers to make cakes and appetizers for all kinds of gatherings.  She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of ingredients, serving dishes and decorative products for her cakes and to purchase wool, buttons and new fabric.  Guillermina wants to keep growing her business and in the near future have a stand to display her products.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of ingredients, serving dishes and decorative products for her cakes and to purchase wool, buttons and new fabric.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, nuevamente solicita un préstamo para la reparación de la bicicleta, en la cual se traslada a la venta de pan, además que tendrá una parte en efectivo para la compra de pan dulce y francés.
Para Juan ha sido un avance en su trabajo, ya que con este apoyo mantiene dinero disponible para la compra de pan, esto le ayuda para generar más ventas y tener más ganancias.
texts.en:
Juan is requesting a new loan to repair his bicycle, which he uses when he is selling bread. In addition, he will use part of the loan to buy sweet bread and French bread.

In order for Juan to advance in his job, he needs to have available funds to buy bread. This will help him generate more sales and have more income.

loans.use: to pay for bicycle repairs and to buy bread.

loans.name: Carlos Nelson

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con su familia, sus hijos de 15 y 18 años de edad, y su esposa, él trabaja como taxista, todos los días de 6:00am a 7:00pm, en su trabajo realiza viajes fuera de la ciudad, para tratar de ganar más clientes en el día.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la reparación del taxi, pagara mecánico y comprara los repuestos que sean necesarios, este préstamo le ayudara para hacer las reparaciones necesarias al taxi, manteniéndolo en buenas condiciones para brindar el servicio a los clientes, de una manera más segura.
La aspiración de Carlos es mejorar su vehículo, proveer ingresos para su familia  y apoyar a sus hijos para que estos se superen.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his family: his children who are 15 and 18 years old and his wife.  He works as a taxi driver every day from 6am until 7pm.  He sometimes does trips out of the city to acquire more customers during the day.

He is asking for a loan to repair the taxi, pay the mechanic and to buy whatever spare parts might be necessary.  This loan will help him do necessary repairs on the taxi keeping it in good condition to provide customer service in a safer way.

Carlos’ hope is to improve his vehicle, to provide family income and to support his children so that they will get ahead.

loans.use: to pay the mechanic to repair the taxi.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es: La socia  Justina continua administrando su negocio de venta de materiales de construccion, la socia ha crecido mucho y tiene sus clientes frecuentes y en esta ocasion la socia desea invertir el credito en la compra de materiales como arena, cemento, cascajo, entre otors para implementar su negocio y mejorar sus ventas ella desearia crecer aun mas y poder ser mayorista esto le daria mas desarrollo economico y mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Justina continues to manage her business of selling construction materials. She has grown tremendously and has frequent customers. On this occasion, she wants to invest a loan in the purchase of materials such as sand, cement, gravel, and other products so that she can keep her business in operation and improve her sales.

Justina wants to grow even more so that she can become a wholesaler. This will help her to develop financially and provide a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, gravel, and other products.

loans.name: Ana Delis

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de frutas y hortalizas, vive con cuatro hijos y su esposo, dos de sus hijos están casados; Ana se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas y hortalizas, tiene 20 años en el negocio, por el momento sus hijos que aun dependen de ella le ayudan  a atender el negocio.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de uvas, fresas, manzanas, lechugas, rábanos, pepinos, chiles entre otros que son frutos frescos para ofrecer a los clientes,  esta inversión le ayudara para adquirir estos productos y poder fortalecer el negocio.
Su aspiración es que sus hijos menores, puedan continuar estudiando, que se superen y en su momento que formen sus propios hogares, por el lado del negocio quiere continuar creciendo y mejorando la atención a la clientela.
texts.en:
Ana sells fruit and vegetables.  She lives with four children and her husband.  Two of her children are married.  Ana is a fruit and vegetable merchant; she’s been in business 20 years.  For the moment, the children who still depend on her help her tend to the business.

She is asking for a loan to buy grapes, strawberries, apples, lettuce, radishes, cucumbers and peppers, among others which are fresh fruit to offer her customers.  This investment will help her acquire these products to strengthen the business.

Her hope is that her younger children will be able to stay in school so that they will improve themselves and in time form their own homes.  With respect to the business, she wants to continue to grow and to improve customer service.

loans.use: to buy grapes, strawberries, apples, lettuce, radishes and cucumbers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bananas, cassava and milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, needles, scissors, ribbon and embroidery, among others.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de leña y maíz para fortalecer el negocio, ella quiere seguir mejorando cada día, por eso se interesa por cancelar oportunamente y recibir de estos beneficios crediticios cada vez que los necesite.
Los préstamo le han dado fuerza para mejorar las ventas y su condición familiar también ha mejorado.
texts.en: Ana is asking for a loan to buy firewood and corn to strengthen the business.  She wants to continue improving every day.  This is why she’s interested in repaying on time so that she can receive these credit benefits every time she needs to.  The loans have given her strength to improve sales and her family situation has improved also.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es: La Sra. Rosalía, es cliente antigua de la institución,  ya se encuentra en su tercera secuencia, se dedica a la venta de comida, ella vende almuerzos, esta sacando crédito  para compra de insumos (arroz, azúcar, papa, fideo y otros, en el momento de la evaluación del crédito la Sra. Rosalía demostró una actitud buena, Cortez y amable, razón por la cual se la escogió para crédito Kiva. La Sra. Rosalía tiene su negocio en la zona de Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz Bolivia, ella vende almuerzos y sopa de fideo, a partir de las 9 de la mañana hasta las 22:30 aproximadamente todos los días, su principal aspiración es comprarse un terreno y tener su casa.
texts.en:
Rosalía is a longstanding client of the institution since she’s in her third sequence.  She sells food: lunches.  She is taking out a loan to buy ingredients (rice, sugar, potatoes, noodles and others).  At her evaluation, Rosalía had a good, cordial and kind attitude which is why she was chosen for a Kiva loan.

Rosalía has her business in the city of La Paz’s Sopocachi zone.  She sells lunches and noodle soup from 9am until 10:30pm approximately every day.  Her main goal is to buy a lot and to own a house.

loans.use: to buy supplies like rice, sugar, potatoes, noodles and others.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: La socia continua con su negocio de venta de cosmeticos por catalogos, la socia trabaja tambien tejiendo diferentes chalecos, chompas, gorros, guantes, chalinas, para niños y adultos segun los pedidos que le hagan, la socia reparte sus catalogos le hacen los pedidos y una vez que llegan los productos ella los entrega  a los clientes y le pagan en dos partes. la socia tambien reliza estos tejidos bellos en los ratos libres que tiene. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de lanas, botones, hilos, y colonias, perfumes, rimels, labiales para tener en stock.
texts.en: The member continues with her business selling cosmetics via catalogue; she also works knitting vests, sweaters, caps, gloves and shawls to order for children and adults.  She distributes her catalogues and orders are placed.   Once she receives the products she delivers them to her customers who pay her in two installments.  She also makes these lovely knitted items in her free time.  She’s asking for the loan to buy wool yarn, buttons, thread and cologne, perfume, eyeliner and lipstick to have in stock.

loans.use: to buy wool yarn, buttons, thread, cologne, perfume, eyeliner and lipstick to have in stock.

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para comprar más materia prima y seguir realizando las ventas, él invertirá este préstamo en cuero, ya que es su principal material para su trabajo.
Él manifiesta que ha mejorado el negocio, debido a las inversiones por medio de los préstamos, ha suplido las necesidades básicas del hogar y hasta la fecha no ha tenido dificultades.
texts.en: José decided on a new loan to buy more raw materials to continue making sales.  He will invest the loan in leather which is his main material for work.  He states that business has improved due to the investments made thanks to the loans.  He has met his basic needs at home and to date has had no difficulties.

loans.use: to buy leather.

loans.name: Emilio Alejandro

texts.es:
Emilio de 22 años, con la ayuda de Dios y de su familia Pudo comprar una tricimoto para de esa forma poder sacar adelante a su familia.

Trabaja todos los días de la semana de 6 am hasta las 8 pm. Su único problema es la delincuencia del sector en el que vive. Está casado  su esposo se encarga de los quehaceres domésticos y tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad. 

Con el prestamo quiere comprar una tricimoto para tener mejores ingresos. Su meta a alcanzar es poder terminar de construir su casa para poder vivir mejor y ayudarle a su esposa a establecer un negocio de venta de ropa.
texts.en:
Emilio is 22 years old. "With God's help" and that of his family, he was able to buy a three-wheeled motorcycle, which he has used to help his family get ahead. 

He works every day of the week, from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. His only problem is the level of crime in the area where he lives. He is married, and his wife takes care of the management of the household. He has a 3-year-old son. 

With the loan, he wants to buy another three-wheeled motorcycle so he can increase his income. The goal he is working toward is finishing the construction of his house, so that they can live better, and also helping his wife establish a clothing sales business.

loans.use: to buy a three-wheeled motorcycle.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: Cecilia, de nuevo se decidió por otro préstamo, porque lo necesita para  invertirlo en su negocio y comprar materia prima como: maíz, leña, cal, el objetivo de ella es mejorar en su negocio y tener lo necesario para darles una buena atención a los clientes. Los financiamientos anteriores le ayudaron a obtener más ingresos y sobre todo tener lo necesario para su familia.
texts.en: Cecilia has once again decided to take out a loan. She needs it to invest in her business and buy supplies such as corn, firewood and lime. Her objective is to improve her business and have what she needs to provide good service to her customers. The previous loans have helped her increase her income, and above all, to have everything she needs for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and lime.

loans.name: Karin Pilar

texts.es: La socia sigue administrando su negocio de compra y venta de materiales de construccion, la socia trabaja junto a su conyugue, la socia compra arena, ladrillos, cemento para la venta ella desea a futuro crecer y mejorar sus ventas, la socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillos, arena para incrementar sus ventas y mejorar la calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en: Karin Pilar continues administering her business buying and selling construction materials. She works alongside her husband. Karin Pilar buys sand, bricks and cement to sell and hopes in the future to grow and improve her sales. She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of cement, bricks and sand to increase her sales and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an air compressor.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa , tiene 39 años de edad, casada desde hace 20 años, tiene 7 hijos de 4, 7, 10, 18, 21, 22 y 25 años de edad, vive en una aldea de Santa cruz de Yojoa. Su esposo se dedica  a la agricultura.
Desde hace 3 años se motivo a establecer una pulpería (venta de productos de la canasta básica familiar, como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, sal, manteca, condimentos, jabón, pastas etc.), ya que su casa esta en frente de un colegio, aprovecha a vender refrescos, jugos,churros, confites, pan, otras cosas que necesitan los estudiantes, hasta la venta de comida como otros ingresos. Este negocio ha sido rentable, de éste obtiene los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de estudio de sus hijos. Con ODEF a solicitado varios préstamos, este es el séptimo y son para invertir en su negocio en compra de productos alimenticios.
texts.en:
Josefa, 39, has been married for 20 years and has 7 children who are 4, 7, 10, 18, 21, 22, and 25 years old.  She lives in a village in Santa Cruz de Yojoa.  Her husband’s a farmer.

Three years ago she decided to open a grocery store (sells basic family staple items like rice, beans, sugar, salt, lard, condiments, soap, noodles, etc.) because her house is across from a school and she takes advantage of this to sell students soft-drinks, juice, snacks, sweets, bread and other things they need.  She even sells food to earn extra income.  This business has been profitable and earns the necessary income from it to cover her children’s educational costs.  She has asked ODEF for several loans and this is her 7th one; all have been used to buy foodstuffs.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Vicente Ramon

texts.es: Vicente Ramón se dedica a la venta y elaboración de ladrillos. Él tiene 21 años en este negocio, inicio por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar, él es un padre muy responsable y disfruta de tener este medio de vida. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de arcilla, cemento, arena, entre otros productos. actualmente tiene varios pedidos que le han efectuado.
texts.en: Vicente Ramón has made a living making and selling bricks for the past 21 years. He started out of the necessity to cover household expenses. He is a very responsible father who enjoys this way of life. He is requesting the loan to purchase clay, cement, sand and other products. He currently has a number of orders he needs to fulfill.

loans.use: to purchase clay, cement, sand and other products.

loans.name: Telma

texts.es: La socia continua con su negocio y ella sigue trabajando vendiendo productos de belleza, la socia vende los productos de belleza como labiales, perfumes, cremas y otros por catalos y una ves que le hacen el pedido ella pasa a sus jefes y le envian al cabo de un par de semanas, luego ella los distribuye y espera a que los clientes le cancelen, la socia suele darles en dos partes; La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de productos de belleza en oferta para venderlos mas adelante en otras campañas y esa sera su ganancia.
texts.en: Telma continues administering her business selling beauty products. She sells cosmetics such as lipsticks, perfumes, creams and other items via catalog, and once she receives her orders, she passes them to her bosses, who send the products every couple weeks. She then distributes the products and waits for her customers to pay what they owe. Telma is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of beauty products to sell in future campaigns for profit.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products to later sell.

loans.name: El Buen Samaritano 3, 4 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Benita is one of the members of the “El Buen Samaritano 3, 4 & 5” (The Good Samaritan). They are micro entrepreneurs who sell clothing, assorted merchandise, shoes, crafts, etc. They sell mainly in a community located in the north of Santo Domingo; this is the area where the poorest community and neighborhood in the city of Santo Domingo are located.

Benita makes her home in a simple structure with her long term partner and their two children. She tells us that her most favorite things to do are to work and study.

Benita has been working in her beauty salon for about six years, which she started after working in one and learning all the techniques. She saved enough money to buy some tools like a hairdryer, brushes, and hair products. Now her little business is set with more tools and clients. She is ready to receive her second loan with Esperanza Internacional, after successfully paying back her previous one. She will use this new loan to invest by purchasing hair and cosmetic products. 

Benita will use the profits to save. Her future plans are to have her business in a local area, to have her own house, and to educate her children. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy hair and cosmetic products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase thread, needles and different colored fabrics.

loans.name: Rene Amilcar

texts.es:
René, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, tienen casa propia, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, este negocio lo inicio hace 7 años, con la ayuda de su familia.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos frescos, pescado, camarones, langostas, ostras, conchas y más mariscos del gusto de los clientes, esta inversión mejorara la disponibilidad en el negocio, abriendo más puertas a través del manejo de este crédito, para futuras inversiones.
Su aspiración es que el negocio sea más rentable, que aumenten los ingresos para su familia y tener más oportunidades de crecimiento.
texts.en:
René lives with his wife and children in a house that they own. He sells shellfish. He has been doing this job for seven years, with the assistance of his family.
He is asking for this loan in order to buy fresh supplies such as fish, shrimp, lobsters, oysters, conch and other shellfish that his customers would enjoy. This investment will improve the availability of fish in his business. This loan will open new doors to future opportunities.
Rene desires a more profitable business. This loan will improve his earnings, which will benefit his family and allow his business to grow.

loans.use: to buy fresh products such as fish, shrimp, oysters and lobster.

loans.name: Dorian

texts.es:
La señorita Dorian,  tiene 23  años de edad, viven en la calle Cochabamba de la  provincia de Mizque del departamento de Cochabamba, en la casa de sus padres 
Dorian es una jovencita  muy querida y respetada en el lugar donde vive, por lo dedicada a su trabajo, desde muy pequeña se dedicó a trabajar y hace tres años saco un crédito para comenzar trabajar vendiendo productos de salud, con la ganancia logro comprarse una parcela de lote de terreno para construir su casita, con el crédito que ahora   está solicitando es para construir una verja y muro de pared en el lote de terreno que se compró y de esta manera comenzar ya a construir su propio hogar 
 El crédito ayudara mucho a Dorian en el avance de construir su pequeña casita.
texts.en:
Miss Dorian is 23 years old. She lives in Cochabamba, in the province of Mizque, in the department of Cochabamba with her parents. Dorian is a loved and respected young woman in the city where she lives. She has been working hard since she was very young. Three years ago she obtained a loan to be used to start a business selling health products. With her earnings she was able to buy a small lot to be used to build a small house. With this loan she would like to build a gate and a wall on her lot. This is how she can begin to construct her own house.
This loan will really help Dorian to begin building her small house

loans.use: to build a wall and gate on her land.

loans.name: Rosa Lina

texts.es:
Rosa, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para la compra de más cerdos, ya que quiere aumentar su granja, esta nueva inversión le permitirá tener más cerdos, para tener disponible para los clientes.
Ella ha mejorado la condición de su familia, teniendo mayor solvencia económica que antes no la tenían.
texts.en:
Rosa is asking for a new loan in order to buy pigs. She would like to increase her stock. This new loan will allow her to buy more pigs. She will then be able to improve her customer service. 
Rosa is improving the conditions for her family. They will be more financially secure, which is something that they didn’t have in the past.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Cristobal Javier

texts.es:
Cristóbal, está interesado por un nuevo préstamo, para completar el valor de un vehículo pick up, para transportar el pan, por las zonas donde tiene clientes, esta compra de trasporte le ayudara para abastecer a un mayor número de zonas y clientes.
La condición de Cristóbal ha mejorado, debido al aumento en sus ventas y ganancias.
texts.en: Christopher is interested in a new loan, which will be used to pay off the loan on his pickup truck. This truck will be used to transport bread to areas where he has customers. This transportation will help him to supply his bread to a larger area and more customers. Christopher’s situation has improved. This loan will increase his sales and earnings.

loans.use: to pay off the loan on his vehicle.

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es:
Adriana vive en el municipio de San Felix donde inició  su negocio de venta de mercancía en un local arrendado, con este negocio ella se consigue su sustento diario para ella y su pequeño hijo de 6 años.

Ella se sueña con tener su local propio y con un almacén con variedad de mercancía para ofrecerle a sus clientes, además así le puede brindar a su hijo una estabilidad económica y emocional.
texts.en:
Adriana lives in the city of San Felix. She started her business, selling merchandise, in a rented space. With this business she is able to provide daily sustenance for herself and her small six-year-old son. 
Her dream is to own her own property and have a small grocery store there with a variety of merchandise to offer to her customers. She would also like to provide her son with economic and emotional stability.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, de 29 años, es una hombre bueno y muy amable. Es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en su casa propia solo, pero el aún tiene el compromiso de aportar en los gastos en el hogar de sus padres, por quienes siempre esta al pendiente para poder brindarles lo que necesiten. El trabajo de Juan consiste en la venta de bebidas, el compra al por mayor y los vende al menudeo agregándole algunos complementos como venderlos helado y con sorbetes cada uno. Lleva realizando este trabajo desde hace un años. Cuando empezó se encontró que había mucha competencia pero al pasar el tiempo empezaron a preferir sus productos por que les daba muy heladitas y con buen humor, el trabaja solo y es muy fundamental para tener un ingreso extra. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo de poder hacer otras cosas más, además trabaja en una entidad bancaria de la ciudad y eso le permite tener una mejor estabilidad económica. Le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene dos ingresos y desea seguir así ya que tiene en mente implementar aún áas su negocio. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así sentirá seguro para poder avanzar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más bebidas para seguir con su venta y seguir obteniendo mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Juan, who is 29 years old, is a good, very kind, man. He is single, has no children, and lives alone in his own house, but he still undertakes to contribute to his parents' household expenses. He always keeps an eye on his parents so that he can offer them anything they need.

Juan's work consists of selling drinks, which he buys in bulk, and oftn sells alongside related products such as ice-cream and sorbets. He has been doing this work for a year. When he began, he found he had a lot of competition, but as time has gone on people began to prefer his products, because the products are always well chilled and served with a smile. He works alone, which is esential to maintaining his income. What he likes about his work is that it gives him time to do other things: he also works in a bank in the city, which gives him greater financial stability. Things are going very well because he has two incomes - and while he would like to continue this way, he has it in mind to build up his business. This will be his first loan from MFP. He is very happy to know he can access this financial support, because with it he feels he has more security in developing his business. With the sum he has requested, he will buy more drinks to continue increasing his sales and improving his earnings.

loans.use: To buy more drinks.

loans.name: Maria De La Cruz

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 44 años de edad y vive en la aldea de Angel Fajardo en el municipio de Chamelecon. Ella es casada y tiene dos hijos de 27 y 7 años de edad, los cuales están estudiando.

Maria se convirtió en microempresaria hace 15 años cuando empezó una mini-farmacia. En su farmacia vende medicamentos de primera necesidad como aspirinas, antiácidos y jarabes. También da charlas de enfermería. Viendo que su clientela crecía, ella empezó a solicitar créditos para surtir aún más el negocio. Según ella, sus mayores desafíos son la delincuencia implacable de la zona y las inundaciones en temporada de lluvia. 

Maria ha solicitado varios créditos con ODEF, de forma individual y grupal. Este crédito de L6,000 es su séptimo crédito. Lo va a utilizar para la compra de medicinas para aumentar su inventario de medicamentos. Maria nota que su meta de poner un negocio propio ya se cumplió y que ahora sólo queda superarse más.
texts.en:
María, 44, lives in the village of Ángel Fajardo in the township of Chamelecón.  She’s married and has two children who are 27 and 7 years old; they are both studying.

María became a micro businesswoman 15 years ago when she opened a mini-pharmacy.  She sells basic medicines like aspirin, antacids and syrups in her pharmacy.  She also gives health lectures.  Seeing that her clientele was growing she started asking for loans to better stock the business.  According to her, her greatest challenges are the implacable delinquency in the area and the floods during the rainy season.

María has asked for several ODEF loans both as an individual and as part of a group.  This L6,000 loan is her 7th and she’ll use it to buy medicine to increase her stock inventory.  María notes that she’s reached her goal of setting up a business of her own and now all that remains is to improve still more

loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Don Fernando desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de pescado y pollo por las calles de los barrios cercanos a su casa, el e una pequeña carreta se paseo gritando “pescado, pollo, pescado, pollo, fresco pescado y pollo”, con este trabajo el consigue su sustento diario, ya que no tiene familia.

El quiere tener su propia distribuidora en un local propio para poder así  mejorar su calidad de vida y de esta forma también su economía.
texts.en: For many years, Don Fernando has been selling fish and chicken on the streets of his neighbourhood. He goes about with a little hand-cart, calling "fish and chicken, fish and chicken - fresh fish and chicken!" He makes enough from this work to sustain himself, because he has no family. He would like to have his own, fixed, distribution point in the area, to be able to have a better quality of life and his financial situation.

loans.use: To buy stock.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
José, solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, este es el negocio de José comprar y vender cerdos, por eso continuamente busca los servicios crediticios para mantener siempre en su granja cerdos, engordarlos y cuidarlos para comercializaros.
Él y su familia viven en mejores condiciones y han solventado muchas necesidades a través del apoyo con los préstamos.
texts.en: José is seeking a loan to buy pigs. His business is buying and selling pigs, and to do so he continues to seek credit to maintain his herd, fattening them up and looking after them until he takes them to market. He and his family live in better conditions now and have resolved many of their difficulties with the support of previous loans.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Maximiliano Guillermo

texts.es:
Maximiliano, quiere seguir trabajando en la agricultura y la compra y venta de ganado, por eso solicita nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono, semilla, herbicidas, para realizar las siembra de maíz. Estos préstamos le han ayudado para la obtención de cosechas logrando anticiparse al pago, para mantener un buen record crediticio.
Él vendió la cosecha del cultivo anterior, generando así ingresos para su familia y solventando necesidades familiares.
texts.en: Maximiliano would like to continue his work as a crop and livestock farmer.  Therefore he is requesting a new loan to buy supplies such as fertilizer, seeds and herbicides to plant corn.  The loans have helped his crop business and enabled him to maintain a good credit record.  The last harvest he sold generated a good income for his family and they were able to take care of household expenses.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and herbicides.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
Flor de María pertenece al banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Flor de María tiene 46 años de edad y está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Paruro y desde hace 26 años que radica en la ciudad de Salvación. 

Flor de María tiene un local donde atiende compromisos sociales como por ejemplo bautizos, matrimonios, cumpleaños y aniversarios. Flor de María también se dedica a la elaboración de refrescos y helados en su domicilio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Flor de María requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo carne, verduras, sacos de arroz, vinos, gaseosas, agua mineral y otras cosas más. 
 
Flor de María agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Flor de María belongs to the communal bank "Del Futuro del Manu" which holds its meetings every month in the city of Salvación in the Manu Province in the department of Madre de Dios.

Flor de María, 46, is married and has four children.  She was born in the city of Paruro and has lived in Salvación for 26 years.

She has a business for social engagements such as baptisms, weddings, birthday celebrations and anniversaries.  She also makes homemade softdrinks and ice-cream.  She has been in business for several years and it is going well for her thanks to her hard work.

She is requesting a loan to buy goods such as meat, vegetables, sacks of rice, wine, sodas, mineral water and other items.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy goods such as meat, vegetables, sacks of rice, wine, sodas, mineral water and other items.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy home appliances.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn, eggs, soup, oil, pork, beef and milk.

loans.name: Edison Adrian

texts.es:
Edison inició esta actividad desde hace varios años y con esto a logrado sostener a su compañera y sus pequeños hijos, este negocio se encuentra en el parque principal del municipio de Santuario, allí Edison realiza a sus clientes cualquier tipo de servicio de peluquería.

El quiere tener inmobiliario nuevo y un local mas grande para poder atender mas clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida, además así le puede ofrecer a su familia un futuro estable y con la posibilidad de realizar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Edison started his business several years ago and it has allowed him to support his partner and small children.  His hairdressing salon is in the main park of the municipality of Santuario where he offers all types of salon services.  

He wants to buy new furniture and have a larger shop so he can attend to more customers.  This would improve his lifestyle and give his family a more stable future so they can carry out their dreams.

loans.use: To buy supplies.

loans.name: Doris Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doris, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, para la compra de mercadería de temporada, esta nueva inversión le ayudara para ofrecer a los clientes nuevos productos, con estilos y colores diferentes, la compra será específicamente en zapatos, camisas, pantalones, blusas.
Este tipo de inversiones le ayudan a Doris para aumentar su potencial y poco a poco crecer en el mercado.
texts.en:
Doris is requesting a new loan to buy seasonal merchandise.  This new investment will help her to offer her customers new products in different colors and styles.  She will specifically buy shoes, shirts, pants and blouses.

This type of investment helps Doris to increase her potential and gradually grow in the market.

loans.use: to buy shoes, shirts, pants and blouses

loans.name: Daniel Ezequiel

texts.es:
Daniel pertenece al banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Daniel tiene 45 años de edad y está casado y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos, él nació en la ciudad de Puno y desde hace 15 años que radica en la ciudad de Salvación. 

Daniel es Ingeniero Civil y trabaja de forma independiente, él tiene una pequeña oficina de consultoría de Ingeniería donde se realizan por ejemplo planos para construcciones y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Daniel requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de escritorio como papel, lapiceros, planos, tintes, y otras cosas más. 
 
Daniel agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Daniel is a member of the 'Del Futuro del Manu' community bank.  The bank's meetings take place once a month in the city of Salvación, in Manu province.

Daniel is 45 years old, married, and has two children from this relationship.  He was born in the city of Puno and has been living in the city of Salvación for fifteen years.

Daniel is a civil engineer and is self employed.  He has a small engineering office where they make plans for buildings and other things.  He has been in this business for several years and it is doing well thanks to the effort that he puts into his work.

On this occasion, Daniel needs a loan to buy stationery supplies such as paper, pencils, maps, ink and other products.

Daniel is grateful for this loan and appreciates it.  He pledges to make his monthly repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy stationery supplies such as paper, pencils, maps, ink,etc

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Roxana Estefa

texts.es: La señora Roxana es una cliente antigua de la institución, ella trabajo con grupo solidario en varias secuencia, luego se individualizó siendo esta su sexta secuencia, ella tiene la venta de helados en carrito en la zona de Mallasa, tiene también un deposito donde se encuentra su mercadería, ya que por esta temporada de calor sube bastante su venta, el esposo también se dedica a la venta de helados por la zona central, ellos tiene una casita que están construyendo poco a poco, ahí viven con una de sus hijas y sus nietos, la señora es una persona responsable, el dinero del cerdito lo utilizara en la compra de material de construcción para hacer terminar de construir su casita y así poder brindar mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Roxana is a long-standing client of the institution.  She worked with a community bank for several loan cycles then started taking out individual loans.  This is her sixth.

Roxana has an ice cream cart in Mallasa district.  She also has a storage place where she keeps her merchandise as, in this hot season, her sales rise quite a lot.  Her husband also sells ice creams in the central district.  The couple have a small house which they are gradually building.  They live there with one of their daughters and their grandchildren.  Roxana is a responsible person.  She will use her loan money to buy building supplies so that she can finish building her small house and thereby offer more comfort to her family.

loans.use: to buy building supplies so that she can finish building her small house

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 63 años, es una buena mujer, amable y muy luchadora. Es madre soltera de seis hijos quienes son mayores de edad e independientes, tiene una casa propia en donde vive sola. Desde hace mucho tiempo ella decidió trabajar mucho, para así educar y alimentar a sus hijos quienes ahora ya mayores y aportan con algunos gastos que ella necesita, pero aun así ella trabaja mucho para poder solventarse. EL trabajo de Juana se divide en tres grupo, el primero es el de la venta de abarrotes, realiza las compras de productos al por mayor y se encarga de vender al menudeo, de este negocio saca un promedio de 25% de ganancia de acuerdo a su inversión; su segundo trabajo consiste en la costura, realizando sus propias creaciones y realizando trabajados para algunos clientes; y por último se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, posee muchos y dentro de ellos tiene una que esta preñada, tiene ya realizando varios años en estos negocios. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener tiempo para poder realizar sus tres actividades. Le esta yendo muy bien, tiene pedidos siempre de sus chanchos y los vende a un buen precio, espera seguir creciendo su trabajo así como tener una espacio más grande para la crianza de estos animales. Este será el crédito número 9 con MFP, por tanto espera un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con su objetivo, de seguir creciendo de a poco. Está muy contenta de trabajar con su banco comunal ya que todos se mostraron muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería para su tienda de abarrotes, además comprará alimentos balanceados para sus animales y algunas vacunas y vitaminas que tiene aplicar a sus cerditos que están por nacer.
texts.en:
63-year-old Juana is a good, kind and very tenacious woman.  She is a single mother to six children who are all now grown up and independent.  She owns her own house and lives there alone.  A long time ago, Juana decided to work hard so that she could educate and feed her children (who are now grown up and support her with some of her needs).  However, even so, she still works hard in order to support herself.

Juana's work can be divided into three.  Firstly, she sells groceries.  She buys her products wholesale and then sells them retail.  In this business, she makes an average profit of 25% in accordance with what she invests.  Her second line of work is sewing.  She makes her own creations and also carries out work for some customers.  Finally, she raises pigs.  She has a lot of pigs and currently has one which is pregnant.  She has been in these businesses for several years.

What Juana likes about her work is that it allows her the time she needs to carry out all three of her activities.  Her business is going well as she always has orders for her pigs and she sells them at a good price.  She hopes to continue growing in her business and to have a larger space in which to raise her animals.

This will be Juana's ninth loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive a small loan so that she can reach her goal of gradually continuing to grow in her business.  She is very happy to be working with her community bank as all the members are very responsible.  Juana will use the sum she has requested to buy merchandise for her grocery store.  She will also buy nutritionally-balanced feed for her animals and some vaccines and vitamins that she needs to give to her piglets which are about to be born.

loans.use: to buy merchandise with which to stock her store and to buy food and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Jose Nelson

texts.es:
José, ha realizado su inversión con el préstamo anterior, tuvo muy buenos resultados, por eso está motivado para aumentar la mercadería, actualmente comprara concentrado para las gallinas, además comprara abono para preparar la siembra de la temporada.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo para mantener el equilibrio necesario y atender a los clientes, con la venta de gallinas y de granos básicos.
texts.en:
José made an investment with a previous loan and had very good results. That is why he was motivated to increase his merchandise. At present he will buy concentrated feed for his hens. He will also buy fertilizer to prepare for the planting season. 

The previous loan helped him to maintain the necessary balance and attend to his customers when selling hens and basic grains.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed for his hens.

loans.name: Rosa Catalina

texts.es:
Rosa, por necesidad en su negocio, se deciD. por un nuevo préstamo, para invertirlo en la compra D. quintales D. maíz, ya que le gusta mantener disponible para poder aumentar la producción en cualquier momento, pues la demanda no es igual todos los días.
Ella ha tenido una evolución positiva, después D. comenzar a invertir los préstamos, el negocio ha mejorado mucho y sus ingresos tambien, teniendo ahora una condición mucho más estable.
texts.en:
Rosa has decided to take out a new loan as her business needs it.  She will invest her loan in buying 100lb sacks of corn as she likes to have this available so that she can increase her production at any moment because her demand is not the same every day.

Rosa has progressed well.  Since starting to invest her loans, her business has improved a lot and her income has too.  She now has much more stable conditions.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: María, necesita invertir en el negocio, por esta razón solicita otra vez un préstamo, e invertirlo en frutas, verduras, carnes, huevos, leche, pan, para ofrecer en el negocio, ella está motivada, ya que la inversión anterior le dio buenos resultados, sus ganancias aumentaron y pudo pagar el préstamo sin atrasos; la condición familiar mejoro, pues al tener disponible más dinero, también pudo ofrecer una vida mejor en estos meses a la familia.
