texts.en: María needs to invest in her business.  For this reason, she is requesting another loan.  She will invest her loan in buying fruit, vegetables, meat, eggs, milk and bread to offer in her business.  She is motivated because her previous investment gave her good results.  Her profits increased and she was able to repay her loan punctually.  Her family's conditions improved because she had more money available and so was able to offer a better life to her family over these months.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, meat, eggs, milk and bread

loans.name: Astrd Marcela

texts.es:
Astrid vive en el municipio de Sonsón con su esposo, desde hace varios años ella elabora artesanías como muñecos, pesebres, entre otros. Ella con esto le ayuda a su esposo para conseguir el sustento diario.

Ella quiere mejorar su calidad de vida y para esto necesita comprar mas insumos para realizar mas artesanías para la venta, además ella quiere poder vender sus productos en otros municipios y así continuar con su progreso.
texts.en:
Astrid lives in the town of Sonsón with her husband. For several years, she has made artisanal crafts such as dolls, mangers, and more. With this, she helps her husband obtain their daily support.  

She wants to improve her quality of life and for that she needs to buy more materials to make artisanal crafts to sell. In addition, she wants to sell her products in other towns to continue her product.

loans.use: to buy materials to make artisanal crafts in fabric, polystyrene, and wool.

loans.name: Romulo

texts.es:
Romulo pertenece al banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu” y las reuniones de los socios del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Romulo tiene 36 años de edad y está casado y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos, él nació en la ciudad de Salvación y donde realiza todas sus actividades económicas. 

Romulo es técnico en contabilidad y trabaja en la sub región del departamento de Madre de Dios en el área de contabilidad, él y su esposa tienen un negocio familiar que consiste en venta de comestibles para eso tienen una tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Romulo requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz, aceite, fideos y otras cosas más. 
 
Romulo agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Romulo is a member of the 'Del Futuro del Manu' community bank.  The bank's meetings take place once a month in the city of Salvación, in Manu province, in Madre de Dios department.

Romulo is 36 years old, married, and has two children from this relationship.  He was born in the city of Salvación and this is where he carries out all his business activities.

Romulo is an accountant and works in the sub-region of Madre de Dios department in the field of accountancy.  He and his wife have a family business selling groceries.  They have a grocery store located in their home.  He has been in his business for several years and it is going very well thanks to the effort that he puts into his work.

On this occasion, Romulo needs a loan to buy merchandise such as bags of sugar, bags of rice, oil, noodles, etc.

Romulo is grateful for this loan and appreciates it.  He pledges to make his monthly repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as bags of sugar, bags of rice, oil, noodles, etc.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Paola Marily

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Los Jazmines  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Mujer y Fortaleza.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Paola, tiene 24 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 7 meses de edad, el cual requiere de muchos cuidados. Su marido es chofer y trabaja en Manta.

Ella se dedica al comercio, vende productos de la marca Esika (productos de cosméticos, belleza, perfumería y accesorios de damas), trabaja cuatro días a la semana ya que además de vender estos productos también los fines de semana prepara comida para la venta, este es un negocio que hace poco instalo pero le está dejando muy buenos ingresos, además porque allí mismo ella puede vender sus otros productos los mismos que deja  a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Lleva en  la venta de cosméticos 4 años y con la venta de comida tres meses y le va muy bien. 

Este crédito es para comprar víveres para preparar los alimentos así como también una olla grande, platos, cucharas y vasos para mejorar su negocio de comidas. Este es su quinto ciclo en el Banco Comunal le gusta porque gracias a los créditos a podido mejorar su vida.

 Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the members of the 'Mujer y Fortaleza' (Woman and Strength) community bank meet in Los Jazmines district, in the city of Portoviejo.  Portoviejo is the capital of Manabí province and has been known for many years as the 'City of the Royal Tamarind Trees'.

Here we meet 24-year-old Paola who has a common-law relationship and a 7-month-old son from this relationship who needs a lot of care.  Her partner is a driver and works in Manta.

Paola sells Esika-brand products (cosmetics, beauty products, perfumes and ladies' accessories).  She works four days a week in this business.  In addition to selling these products, she also makes food to sell on weekends.  She set up her food business recently but it is making her very good income.  In addition, she is able to sell her other products there.  She sells them on credit and collects payment every two weeks.  Paola has been selling cosmetics for four years, selling food for three months, and things are going very well.

Paola will use this loan to buy ingredients with which to prepare her food.  She will also buy a large pot, plates, spoons and cups in order to improve her food business.  This is her fifth loan cycle with her community bank and she likes it because, thanks to the loans, she has been able to improve her life.  Her dream is to have a large restaurant.

loans.use: to buy food products, a pot, plates, spoons and cups

loans.name: Reginaldo

texts.es:
Reginaldo, seguirá invirtiendo en el negocio, pues su deseo de prosperar le ayuda para dar fuerzas, solicitando nuevamente otro préstamo, para comprar materiales para hacer flores, papel, colorantes, alambres, espelma, ya que quiere ofrecer a los clientes, arreglos florales para difuntos.
Él ha tenido un efecto positivo con el negocio, ya que compro los cerdos, y productos para la tienda, hasta el momento no ha tenido dificultades y sus ventas han mejorado.
texts.en:
Reginaldo will continue investing in his business as his desire to do well gives him strength.  He is requesting another loan to buy materials for making artificial flowers: paper, dyes, wire and candles, as he would like to be able to offer his customers funeral floral arrangements.

Reginaldo's [previous loan] has had a positive effect on his business as he bought pigs and products for his store.  So far, he has not had any difficulties and his sales have improved.

loans.use: to buy paper, dyes, wire and candles
